description.neighborhood: VILLA LOHERB is located besides Dongshan River Park, near the starting of the central mountain. You can enjoy the water and mountain landscape at the same time. Brown Avenue and 52Jia wetland are closed to VILLA LOHERB, too. You can enjoy the endless rice fields and see birds with rich biodiversity here. If you want to go to famous international attractions, it only takes 10 mins to Ecoark or Traditional Arts by car.
description.transit:
If you go to VILLA LOHERB by driving, please go along the 5th National Road to the Luodong exit. Go straight on 191, then turn left to Xie Song Road, turn left to Baofu Road. VILLA LOHERB is just here.
If you go to VILLA LOHERB by public transportation, you can take train or bus to Luodong station, and then take the taxi about 10 minutes to arrive.
description.interaction: In VILLA LOHERB, you can experience local special activities like. 1.Lohas farm: you can experience grow plants with natural agricultural and friendly farming way here. 2.Handmade stuff: plant herb pot and make biscuits. 3.Health housekeeper: nutritionist can help you enjoy health life style and self-health management. 4.Bike trip: ride free bikes with hand-painted map to find sightseeing place here. 5.Festivals: Green Expo will be in spring, children’s folklore festival will be in summer, different season, special festival activities.

description.summary:
Alishan hideaway

《京岄》墨-四人房

日式古宅與阿里山山群相伴，時而無雲大山偶有迷霧森林，京岄會為您寫下與阿里山最獨特的回憶。


**若需雙人入住，我們也可為您調整**


<民宿從未刊登任何形式的廣告，也未曾請部落客寫文推薦，所有訂房資訊以刊登在Airbnb訂房網站之房源內容為主。
description.notes:
1.民宿僅提供住宿，沒有接送服務以及餐點供應，如有造成不便尚請見諒。
2.山區夜晚寧靜，為維護住宿品質，入住房客於晚上8點過後，請放低音量保持安靜。
3.民宿周邊有山林小溪也有茶園，周遭難免偶有飛蛾昆蟲等，若無法忍受大自然的產物，於訂房之時請多三思。
4.預定房源時請詳細閱讀Airbnb中等退訂政策，請勿衝動訂房。
5.申請變更日期以一次為限，且須於入住日五天前申請。
6.若有需要增加棉被請最慢於入住前一天告知，增加一條棉被的費用為新台幣200元。
7.嚴禁自行攜帶任何電器於民宿使用。
8.民宿每間房間可以有一名6歲以下的幼兒免費共鋪（不另外提供棉被組），其他的幼童需計入入住人數，收取加床費用。


民宿從未刊登任何形式的廣告，也未曾請部落客寫文推薦，所有訂房資訊以刊登在Airbnb訂房網站之房源內容為主。
description.neighborhood:
民宿位於阿里山半山腰『石桌』地區，到阿里山森林遊樂區約35分鐘車程。
鄰近奮起湖老街，十分鐘車程即可到達，步行即可上頂石棹步道觀賞日落、雲海、茶園和層層山巒，運氣好時也可欣賞奇幻琉璃光，附近有頂湖自然生態公園、迷糊步道，不上阿里山森林遊樂區也能安排一場愜意的知性旅程。
步行1-5分鐘即有餐廳、小吃店、早餐店、7-11及萊爾富便利商店。
description.transit:
民宿地點位於阿里山公路（台18線）旁，自行開車者可輕易到達，有停車場可停車。
搭乘公車，於公車停靠站下車後，即可到達民宿位址。
搭乘阿里山森林鐵路小火車，請在奮起湖站下車，再轉搭乘公車到石棹站，接著步行約500公尺就可到達。

description.summary:
屋內裝潢是我與老婆歷時三個月時間精心佈置的，我們追求舒適的生活空間及簡約的傢俱，並用深邃金及莫蘭迪藍，讓屋內同時展現出格調及舒適氛圍。我們也提供各樣的家電，讓你都能像回到自己家中一樣方便舒適。

我們渴望將這樣舒適的空間分享給我們在乎的人，也希望旅遊或出差的你，能喜歡這溫馨的氛圍。

1.  距離環狀線幸福站步行2分鐘，至高鐵、台鐵搭捷運10分鐘可抵達,，離台北市中心（台北車站）20分鐘可抵達。
2. 近機場捷運

開車前往
1. 附近有收費停車場
   -台灣聯通  /24小時
   -TIMES /24小時

《住宿空間》
1. 雙人獨立筒床墊
2. 對外窗（面對寧靜巷內）
3. 120公分工作桌椅、小檯燈

《使用空間》
1. 客廳、廚房、洗衣機、熱水器、烤箱、瓦斯爐、電鍋皆可使用
2. 房間內禁止飲食（我們有精美的吧檯歡迎使用:D）
3. 屋內禁止吸菸
4. 公共空間物品使用完畢後，請協助歸位

《生活機能佳》
1. 福壽美食街、康是美、超市、佳瑪步行2分鐘
2. 近Zepp New Taipei、五股工商展覽館

《其他事項》
1. 入住時間為15:00~22:00，如延後入住請於預定時提前告知
2. 為提供優質住宿環境，不提供電視及WIFI
3. 為響應環保，請自備牙刷、牙膏及毛巾
4. 與房東夫妻同住：工作日(周日至周四) 
5. 如有問題問題，歡迎私訊了解，我們非常樂意給您回覆

name: Taiwan Jiufen｜九份山中夢遊 - 星星（有天窗，可泡澡，臨老街，兩人居住的獨立房源）
title: Ruifang District, Taiwan

location.address: Ruifang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan

gallery.caption: 有天窗可看藍天看星空的房間，有自動的天窗可遮蔽
2F-客房與天窗，有自動的天窗可遮蔽
採光好，可看藍天看星空的泡澡空間

hosts.about:
故事所_ 山中夢遊 / OwlStay Jiufen Wander

坐落在九份老街尾，安謐住宅聚落的老房子，屋內保留百年前老居民的厚石牆，並將往日美好年代的古味傢俱，融入現代設計巧思的住宿空間。
夜裡，自山居出發，放緩腳步沿著輕便路，由小管家帶領來自世界各地的旅人，步入喧囂後的美好，淺談山城今昔興衰。
走出城市，踏入山城的浮生得閒。不論風和日麗或細雨綿延，自在感受山海間一日光影變幻。
夜晚與來自世界各地的旅人共聚一堂，一壺茶，一盞酒，話天說地。

recent.comments: A beautiful little place near the night market. The views were incredible and the place was really unique. The staff was friendly and helpful.

items.comments: A beautiful little place near the night market. The views were incredible and the place was really unique. The staff was friendly and helpful.
很好
很美的旅宿

整齊乾淨的環境
很詳盡的入住解說
一個很好放鬆的環境
房間很棒！私人的大空間和很美的夜景，可以的話應該住兩個晚上～

很棒很大的空間！備品很好用非常喜歡，床也很舒服！
但因為廁所及浴缸配置的方式，可能比較適合不介意看到對方洗澡、上廁所的旅伴
總之非常推薦🌷

description.summary:
在這裡，看的見山，眺得到海；
在這裡，有機會看到到晴空萬里的天，細如棉絮的詩雨，或是充滿迷幻的濃霧，看盡一日光影變換｡
夜裡，城市慢下來了，剩下的是你與山城的聲音，看著山海與自我對話。
早晨叫醒你的不是鬧鐘，而是灑進房裡的陽光，開啟你美好的一天。

星星房，有一個躺在床上就可以仰望夜空的天頂窗，
有一個適合在山城夜晚泡澡的大浴缸。
位於九份的住宅聚落，在這裡，可以遠離老街的喧囂，享受山城的寧靜。

｜貼心提醒｜
九份是座山城，處處都是階梯。
在山城內移動建議穿著好走的鞋子，攜帶簡便的行囊，做好入山的準備：）
description.space:
【不可加床，最多只能兩位入住】
星星房為獨立房源，兩位旅人獨享整棟的空間。
房源內有一個房間，一個小客廳，可泡澡的開方式浴缸，以及開放式的衛浴。

｜貼心提醒｜
衛浴空間與房間均為較開放之設計，伴侶或姊妹淘以外之雙人入住還請多留意。
description.access: 房源全部空間。
description.notes:
☛ 訂房後請告知抵達時間，小管家們才能準時幫您辦理入住
☛ 本館無提供停車位，開車的朋友請在出發前以電話或是郵件詢問路線，與停車相關資訊。
☛  因九份位於山區，路較為崎嶇難走，且處處是階梯，建議穿著好走的鞋子，攜帶簡便的行囊，好好享受九份山城。
description.neighborhood:
鬧中取靜的區域，走路約三分鐘到老街，坐落在這山城仍保有往日安謐氣氛的住宅聚落｡

【鄰近的九份景點與商家】
- 九份老街 / 阿妹茶樓 / 昇平戲院：只有 100 公尺的距離
- 超商：7-11 / 全家
- 咖啡店：CHLIV / Got flavor Coffee 老頹咖 / 野事草店
- 公車站：九份老街站
description.transit:
☛ 若搭乘大眾運輸工具，在九份老街站下車，走下觀景平台旁的樓梯抵達輕便路，再沿著輕便路散步約五分鐘，即可到達星星。
☛ 若開車前來，本館無提供停車位，請在出發前以電話或是郵件詢問路線，與停車相關資訊；貼心提醒，最近的停車場與星星的距離，約是五分鐘的散步距離。
description.house_rules:
◼︎入夜後請尊重附近的鄰居好友,勿大聲喧嘩喔。
◼︎本館因安全因素考量，恕無法接待4歲以下小孩。
◼︎夾腳拖的家正常check in時間為15:00~19:00。
◼︎若臨時改變入住時間，也請以電郵或電話告知，否則入住當晚超過19:00，我們將取消您的訂房。人力與資源無法滿足24小時的待命,還請見諒,謝謝。
◼︎夾腳拖的家為背包旅舍, 值班時間為9:30am-08:00pm，若非緊急事項請給小管家好好休息的時間，明天一大早才能做好吃早餐給大家吃。
◼︎退房時間為：11:00 AM
◼︎為了環保請自備牙刷牙膏等私人用品，房內提供一人一條大浴巾/沐浴精/洗髮精。(如需第二條大浴巾需酌收NT.30)
◼︎入住期間無進出時間管制
◼︎夜遊體驗活動為免費參加，但因九份多階梯與坡道,若遇大雨會有安全上的疑慮將會取消夜遊活動。

name: 育鄰螺  (近嘟嘟房、每日僅接待一組房客, 2-6人)
title: Yilan City, Taiwan

hosts.about:
嗨嗨我是Zac，

外商航空空服員，

喜歡旅遊和結交來自世界各地的朋友！

可以說英語、國語、台語、廣東話！

Hi, I am Zac, a flight attendant. 

I like to travel and make friends from all over the world. 

I can speak English, Mandarin, Taiwanese, and Cantonese.
熱愛旅行及生活，研究哲學是最大興趣。

在北部工作的室內設計師,最愛在忙碌的生活裡安排假期,享受各地的美食,歡迎來訪我的私人渡假小宅,周遭生活機能豐富,希望首次到來的你們會喜歡哦｡

-----育鄰螺的由來----
｢德不孤､必有鄰,｣宜蘭舊城北門區是時代巨輪下所創造出歷史悠久的產物,人文條件極具內涵｡此宅位處北門口市中心的一棟老公寓,宛如深海之螺雖小卻能育其淵澤,在時光推衍中彌足珍貴｡

位處宜蘭市最熱鬧的北門口，老公寓二樓經巧手規劃後賦予了這個老房子新的生命，巷口即有收費停車場，附近亦有白線及路邊停車格，下樓1分鐘即可漫步在世代交替的迷人舊街區，享受美食與文化。

預訂後即代表您願意遵守平台之退訂條款規定,除天災人禍或行政命令外,不因您任何個人因素退還款項,請有水準的您,將心比心。

「本房源禁帶寵物、禁打麻將、無早餐」

每日僅接待一組客人，保護您的隱私不受打擾。

寢具及用品使用完畢皆高溫水洗、殺菌處理。

name: Mocean   Close to Wushi Harbor Waiao Beach
title: Toucheng Township, Taiwan

recent.comments:
衛生方面及設備上不是很好。
紗簾一塊一塊髒髒的，窗戶也有揚起的灰塵，雙人臥房的床就緊貼窗簾，易過敏者極不建議選住。
房間內沒有冷氣，需要跟客廳共用。
廚房的抽油煙機不像有抽油煙功能，反倒像排油煙風，煎煮食物煙霧瀰漫，為了住客的肺著想建議改善。
公設游泳池無法使用有點失望，早餐折抵費用一人50元，距離早餐折抵店家步行要二十多分鐘不算近。
總結有點像廉價旅館客房，配不太上這價位，不會再入住。

items.comments:
衛生方面及設備上不是很好。
紗簾一塊一塊髒髒的，窗戶也有揚起的灰塵，雙人臥房的床就緊貼窗簾，易過敏者極不建議選住。
房間內沒有冷氣，需要跟客廳共用。
廚房的抽油煙機不像有抽油煙功能，反倒像排油煙風，煎煮食物煙霧瀰漫，為了住客的肺著想建議改善。
公設游泳池無法使用有點失望，早餐折抵費用一人50元，距離早餐折抵店家步行要二十多分鐘不算近。
總結有點像廉價旅館客房，配不太上這價位，不會再入住。
安靜舒服的地方 很有家的感覺
小而巧舒適的小套房很溫馨，床摸起來軟軟但實際躺起來適中剛好，雨過天晴的頭城窗外風景宜人，環境寧靜，房務人員回覆訊息都很及時也很貼心告知一些注意事項，這次退房糊塗遺漏的物品更貼心與我們聯繫並寄出真的是值得按讚分享👍💯
很新、很溫馨又設計感的房源，週邊機能完善、應有盡有、而且景色很美，非常值得推薦入住。
房間跟照片一樣漂亮 整體很舒適乾淨 尤其是衛浴設備有多功能調整乾燥機 洗澡過程都不怕熱 是CP值很高的民宿！
除了好評之外，都不知說什麼好~

Lie down and watch the mountains and the sea.

name: 【預定先詢問空房】包棟12~23人/近草悟道/審計新村/百貨商圈/有電梯/大廚房/大客廳/免費洗衣機
title: West District, Taiwan

recent.comments: 位置在市區內，周邊環境好又方便，室內空間房間、衛浴都很乾淨，而且還有電梯好讚，入住時管家Wen也介紹得很詳細，真的很適合親友包棟入住～

items.comments: 位置在市區內，周邊環境好又方便，室內空間房間、衛浴都很乾淨，而且還有電梯好讚，入住時管家Wen也介紹得很詳細，真的很適合親友包棟入住～
房源如照片呈現一樣寬敞明亮，小朋友在房內也玩得很開心，衛浴設備也都非常不錯，還有麻將桌遊提供借用，非常期待下次再來台中入住

整體空間非常棒，環境也很整潔
電梯很方便降低大家在搬行李的麻煩，
小幫手在回覆問題和介紹時非常熱情

這次唯一美中不足的部分是交誼廳的冷氣壞掉，
且是入住小幫手介紹時才告知，
包棟民宿最大量使用的空間就是交誼廳，但夏天+頂樓的情況下沒有空調完全無法使用該空間，
大家只能在各個房間中移動，要聊天活動就變的相對麻煩

空調壞掉也許難免，但聽小幫手的說法並不是第一次發生，不管是提前告知，或者是有其他應急備案（如移動式冷氣），這些都是可以提前考慮並準備的，入住當下才告知會讓房客相當錯愕，且無法有任何應變的時間。
第一次住包棟的民宿，讓我找到適合我們13位大人與3歲以 下孩童的住處，住宿環境和服務態度讓我們感到滿意及貼心，價格也親民，下次還有朋友要去台中遊玩的話，我也會極力推薦呦！

民宿很乾淨整潔,跟照片非常相符,管家的講解很仔細,有任何問題都會即時回應.
只是五樓的公共間空調需要改善!
屋主人很友善、房間很寬敞、地理位置也很好，花的錢很值得

name: Frog pool B&B- Froggy No.2 room
title: Wujie Township, Taiwan

gallery.caption: 蛙塘主建築物樓梯一景

hosts.about:
因為蛙塘民宿的設計者是位畫家，在設計過程中無意間看到莫內的名畫“蛙塘”。畫中的畫中的蛙塘，是賽納河畔一處露天咖啡，伴著塞納河粼粼水光，兩岸的綠樹，以及紳士仕女的遊宴玩樂，是莫內非常喜歡去作畫休憩的地方。

所以在打造民宿空間的時候，就以蛙塘為夢想藍圖，希望能在這個空間裡就能看到豐富而多變的色彩：有自然的變化，也有人為的搭配。

所以，在蛙塘，可以看見每棵樹每株花草沒有刻意栽種排列卻不雜亂無章地流露出自然美感也能處處看到七彩的馬賽克、或是鋪上圓滑石頭，拼貼出一幅幅美麗的畫當然民宿主人ＮＡＮＡ也希望這裡也能常有好朋友來聚聚，成為一個精神的所在地。都能讓人有回歸大自然懷抱的感動。

特別的是，蛙塘雖然不是因為青蛙而起的名字，但卻是周圍頑皮青蛙們非常喜歡聚集的地方，偶爾還會鑽到客人的鞋裡玩躲貓貓 ;每年春夏繁殖期的時候常常被客人”抱怨“晚上蛙鳴太大聲呢

來蛙塘，請帶著一顆悠閒放空的心，找個自己喜歡的角落發呆.看書.聽音樂或是騎騎民宿免費提供的腳踏車逛逛田野風光。晚上伴著蛙鳴睡到自然醒然後等待明天主人親手做的豐盛早午餐，這樣才真的叫做度假！

recent.comments:

description.summary: Frog pool B & B situated in the middle of the rice farmland in Wujie Township Of Yilan County.  We look forward to meeting you! Feel free to ask anything during your stay.
description.space:
Froggy#2 room is on The  2ND FL of this main building with air-conditioner and heating, lamp and armchair.
The room includes:
*Real bed that fits 1 to 2 people comfortably. 
*Linens and towels are provided for the guest
*Hair shampoo, shower body gel, hair dryer included
* Sanitary accessories provided. (it’s better with your own toothbrush.)
*Free wifi included
* No smoking completely Indoors. 
*Free Bike

※Notice:Bath , refrigerator & kitchen is on the 1st floor. 
Person who need accompany and senior family member is recommended to lodge in froggy#3 or froggy#4. 

Every guest can enjoy our handmade free breakfast. 
Additional hotel fees extra bed:NT$600/adult
Child without extra bed.NT$300/each

Please keep your voices down after 11pm to enjoy calmly night.

About Frog pool
The designer/artist who built this house based on his dreaming bookstore, for he had saw a Famous Painting called“frog pool “by Claude Monet During His Designing progress then This Designer Used The Frog pool As His Blueprin and Hope To See Ample And Variety Of Colors Within This Area. Therefore We Have Grown Many Trees And Flowers At Random To Create No Messy Up Beautiful Nature Along With Piece By Piece Paintings By Colorful Mosaics Or Patched Pebbles When You Visit Frog pool Please Bring  A Carefree heart To Find Your Favorite Corner To Read, to Listen Music Or To Take A Free Bike Ride Around Wujie Township’s Rustic Scenery. At Night, please Take A Satisfied Sleep Accompanied With The Frog croak  Then To Wake Up For A Delicious Homemade Brunch By Our Housekeeper.

description.notes:
Family with senior member or limited mobility are recommended to lodge in froggy#3 or froggy#4. 

No TV is provided in all frog pool rooms.

Please take off your shoes indoors. 
We accept postpone or full refunds if have any natural disaster,(typhoon or serious earthquake…) happens on the checking date based on official announcement.
Our check in time : 15:00-24:00 (drop bags earlier is ok) 
Check out time : 11:00 am
*Breakfast time is 8am or 9am by guest option, and no later than 10am. We also provide full vegetarian dishes

*Free reading from bookstands and you can bring it back with listed book price if any stained or damaged.

description.interaction: You Can Enjoy Your Privacy Completely and a 24Hrs Housekeeper Standing By at Frog pool.
description.house_rules:
室內全面禁菸,如有需要請移駕戶外,謝謝! 入內請脫鞋
享受夜晚的寧靜,在晚上 11點過後,請降低音量。門禁時間為晚上 11:00

1.預約訂房後,請於三日內匯款房價的一半或全額,逾時恕不保留。如果另有狀況請來電通知一下囉!

   ※預付訂金: 訂房預付金額為住房總金額的1/2。

2.匯完款後請當日以簡訊或email告訴我們轉出帳號後四碼和姓名,以方便核對。謝謝你!

3.延期 請於預定住宿日前7天告知,如未告知將不保留或不退還匯款。

4.取消 請於預訂住宿日前14天告知,可退全數訂金,但如未告知,不予保留不退還匯款。

5.住宿當日如不巧遇到颱風、大地震等不可抗拒之天災(以官方發布為準),可延期或退還全額的訂金匯款。

6.我們的進房時間是下午 3:00 以後,退房時間是早上11:00 以前。   

7.早餐通常為8:00或9:00 兩個時段 可以依照需求調整用餐時間,但請勿超過上午 10:00 。如有素食請先告訴我喔!

8.退房時請一併交還鑰匙,如有遺失酌收150元的鑰匙複製費,請見諒!

9.蛙塘的書都可以拿下來看,但如有污損就請你以書價帶它回家吧,它可能等你很久囉!

description.summary:
With 2 bedrooms/ 1 living room/ 1 bathroom and 1 mini kitchen. We take only one set of guests at a time. You will have exclusive use of all the space. Perfect for family, friends, and couples. Accommodate up to 4 people. 

IMPORTANT：booking before Nov 23, 2019, 2 guests used 2 bedrooms will be charged $300NTD when you check in. And it's new price after Nov 23, no need to extra pay when used 2 bedrooms.
description.space:
The apartment is on the second floor(no elevator). It’s close to Hualien station with convenient stores, cafes, restaurants, laundry, gym, cinema and bowling place in walking distance.

Convenient location:
*Hualien station: 7 mins by walk/ 3 mins by car.
*Downtown Hualien: 5 mins by car.
*Dongdamen night market: 6 mins by car.
*Qixingtan beach. 13 mins by car.
*Farglory ocean park: 20 mins by car.
*Taroko national park: 30 mins by car.

Spacious living room with TV and wifi. The rooms are bright and tidy. Each room is equipped with A/C. Both rooms come with a full bed for two, comfy pillows and bed sheets. You will also find fresh towels, body wash, shampoo in the bathroom. Please bring your own toothbrush and toothpaste. Mini kitchen with fridge and plates, bowls, mugs, etc.

Free essential toiletries are available in the bathroom. Bed sheets and towels are changed between every guest. Well-suited for happy travellers who want quality accommodation, local tips, and an awesome location!
description.access: Living room, mini kitchen, 2 bedrooms and Free WiFi

Check in 15:00 / Check out 11:00

房東人超好，民宿室內大到不行，很適合小孩或三五好友一起住，房間都在2樓同層，游泳池更是超棒

description.house_rules:
泳池7-9月開放！！


訂房人數請依實際入場人數，住宿安全考量，謝絕訪客（假日包棟12人以上、平日包棟5人以上）如有未告知的人數，民宿可無條件取消客戶訂房。
1.烤肉區與廚房設施要自行清潔，如無清潔額外另酌收5000元清潔費

2.入住時需預收押金5000 元，退房時確認無惡意損害、偷竊物品並恢複環境原狀，即退還全額押金！！

3. 房客需自備餐具，房源僅提供鍋子、盤子，使用完需房客自行清洗完成，如無法配合，請自備免洗餐具
4.房價總額未滿20000，房間不會全開，會依入住人數做配房
5.宜蘭噪音管制法，ktv與烤肉需晚上10:00結束，敬請配合
6.請勿攜帶非民宿提供的電器用品，而造成電壓過載
7.因維護戲水池穩定水質狀態，故泳池使用時間下午3點到21點，其餘時段會做水質檢測消毒與清潔

*目前不開放寵物入住

5 things we can't live without? 
warmth 
water 
movement

love

I particularly like being on Airbnb, I love to see people enjoying the space of my place. it's quite different. and when no-one is there, I love nurturing it, theres something about nurturing something that brings out the best in everyone.

it gives me the opportunity to create an environment that serves, gives people a little taste of heart, something more natural in the heart of the city.

I hope you will enjoy staying and thank you in advance for givng me the opportunity to contribute to help making your stay awesome. 

The world is giant playground, better play in it!

recent.comments: Amanda was extremely helpful and responsive! There was a typhoon on the day I was supposed to land and she checked in with me to make sure my flight would depart on time, and provided advice to prepare rain gear and to bring some snacks in case there was heavy rain and restaurants were closed. The place was so cozy and I felt right at home! Amenities were perfect for my 10 day stay, which included an electric stove, microwave, washing machine, hairdryer, plenty of extra towels and more than enough tissue and umbrellas. Super responsive during my stay too. When I couldn't work out the washing machine she came over to test it on the same day and gave clear step-by-step instructions with photos. The location is close to many restaurants and shops and a 3-minute walk away from the MRT station! The place had a receptionist during the day and needed a security fob to enter the building and use the elevator so it was very safe to stay there. Was a pleasant experience -- will be back for sure!

description.house_rules:
在选择预订我的公寓之前,请先阅读以下公寓守则并承诺您能够切实遵守｡抱歉｡虽然有点多,但是请一定要看｡在您阅读完之后,请仔细考虑并确定我的公寓确实适合您或者您与您的同伴｡感谢你们的谅解..

因为过度吵闹而打扰到邻居被认为是极没有教养的行为｡再加上Airbnb在台灣并不是被普遍认知的事物,所以在您入住公寓期间,您必须严格遵守以下的守则,尊重当地的习惯和风俗｡

由于之前入住的客人在晚上过于吵闹,请您谅解我的公寓并不是酒店,而是位于台灣真正的住宅区内｡住宅楼里非常注重保持安静,过于吵闹的行为对人而言是非常不礼貌的｡

正因为如此,我希望您能够保证在入住公寓期间,无论何时都会注意保持安静,且不会做出任何打扰邻居的行为｡

如果您(与您的同伴们)能够保证这点,那么我非常期待你们入住我家｡我想你们一定能够在我家里享受到独一无二的入住台灣民宿的体验｡
相反的,如果您(与您的同伴们)不能够作出以上承诺,或者您希望可以入住一个可以随意大声说话,不用担心会吵到邻居的地方,我想酒店或许更适合｡

非常抱歉事先说了这么多｡但请您(与您的同伴们)体谅｡

在正式预订之前,请慎重衡量我的公寓是否真的适合您和您的朋友｡

※公寓守则※
1.入住时请出示有效身分证件(有照片)登记,若入住时发现资料､房客精神状态有异､实际人数(2岁以上即算一人)与预定人数不符,Airbnb給予房东有权拒绝入住,并不予退还租金｡

(1)请在玄关处脱鞋｡请不要穿着室外用的鞋子进入屋内｡

(2)在楼梯间的时候,请保持安静｡

(3)室内是完全禁烟的,包含厕所｡公寓所在的建筑物内也禁止吸烟｡

(4)出门前,请随手关空调和其他电器的电源｡

(5)出门时,请记得锁门｡

(6)请不要去拜访邻居,请不要按邻居家的门铃｡

(7)公寓入口､大厅､电梯等公共场合,请保持安静｡

(8)破坏公寓或者损坏公寓内的物品需赔偿｡同时我会把这一情况如实写在对您的评价中｡

(9)在您退房那天早上的11点,会有清扫人员整理公寓｡

(10)为了省电节能,请确保在不需要的情况下随手关闭空调开关｡出门时关门关窗｡

(11)公寓只是民宿,并不是宾馆,因此不能提供像宾馆那样的侍应､客房和每日清扫等服务｡请谅解｡

(12)除了预订入住的客人以外,禁止其他人员进入公寓｡

(13)Airbnb在台灣并不是被普遍认知的事物,所以请不要对邻居说您是借宿的客人｡如果有人问起,请说您是我的朋友｡(虽然99%的情况下不会有人询问)

(14)带孩子入住的情况下,为了防止意外发生,请不要让他们靠近窗户或攀爬扶手

Your reservation guest count should be booked as the total guest(s), including all children, and any possible overnight guests. Any overnight stay of an affiliated guest will be considered as an additional guest during your stay, and should not exceed our stated limitation as it is strictly prohibited. An honor system is exercised on your end, or there will be a deduction from your security deposit as an additional guest fee for your entire stay.

--Check In and Check Out--
Check in after 16:00
Check out before 11:00, noon.

--Green-- 
Please turn off all lights and air-conditioner(AC) upon exiting the unit at all times. Any excessive use of electricity will be deducted from your security deposit at USD$10 per night during your entire stay.

--Common Courtesy-- 
Our property is located in a residential-only community, hence please lower your voice while in common spaces, such as the lobby, hallway and etc. No illegal and disruptive behaviors are permitted. Any complaints will result in immediate nonrefundable eviction.

--Non Smoking-- 
Our home is non-smoking. There is an outdoor patio onsite, so please smoke outside with the door closed. Any indoor smoking will be heavily penalized.

--Refundable Security Deposit--
Security deposit is collected on your credit card via Airbnb as a reserved amount, not charged. It is collected 24 hours before your check in, and it is fully refundable at guests' check-out after the apartment is returned in its original condition and when our house rules are abided.

description.notes:
【 入房須知 】
・本民宿採自行入住(電子密碼鎖)
・退房日11點後密碼就會失效，請務必檢查自己的隨身物品是否已攜帶離開
・為了維護民宿品質，本民宿謝絕不實入住人數及寵物偷渡之行為
・為響應環保，外出請隨手關燈和冷氣
・為了保持完好狀態迎接下一組來花蓮遊玩的朋友，請不要破壞民宿任何設施，如果有損壞或遺失請照價賠償
・客房內設有WIFI免費無限上網
・個人貴重物品請隨身攜帶並妥善保管，外出時鎖上房門鎖以策安全，如有遺失恕不負責喔
・民宿位於住宅區，為了確保社區安寧，請在晚間10點後降低音量請勿喧嘩
・以上內容若有變動，恕不另行通知，並以民宿公告為主。

【 路線 】

【 自助洗衣 】

name: 2-2 Downtown Keelung nite mkt(Mthly rent welcome)
title: Ren’ai District, Taiwan

hosts.about:
Enzo House 安樓文旅 <安遊子心  樓濟世情  文藝棲憩  旅夢想行>

1953年。
窗外。進出電影院的人聲鼎沸。
這位於市中心的洋樓，俯看人間世事如戲，也展開了自身的故事序章。
走在這條街上的人們，尋求跳脫日常的幻想與安慰，也踏實的觀照此世的肉身。
洋樓裡，醫生對人們的細心叮嚀，至今仍在基隆人心中靜靜的守護著。
2022年。
安樓有幸接手洋樓，將老建築外牆妥善保存、架設燈光，讓街邊過客都能欣賞洋樓的美 ; 內部空間重置修膳，將珍貴的檜木材料改造再生，加入精選的老件、燈具，打造舒適優雅的旅宿空間，將其世代風華延續下去。

70年的過往，與旅客的生命重疊。
洋樓的日日夜夜，今後其中也有你的欣喜與沉思。

recent.comments: 建物も部屋も完璧な設えでした。また滞在したいです。

items.comments: 建物も部屋も完璧な設えでした。また滞在したいです。

The room looks cozy and comfy, kindly served with welcome snacks. The location is very convenient as it is near to the Keelung Night Market. The room is surprisingly quiet. It was a great experience and I will definitely revisit it again if I go to Keelung in the future!
房間很典雅乾淨，公共區域設備齊全方便
It is a very cute and cozy place. It is close to the night market. Additionally, there is a washer and dryer, which is a plus. I would stay there again.
房源經過用心的整理非常舒適，房內設施加油備品也相當齊全，非常適合旅行之中的休憩唷！
之前住2-1，2-1比較安靜。2-2也很好，冷氣很強，可以睡得安穩。

description.summary: "Enzo House" is a 5-storey Baroque building built by the Ye family in 1953, next to the Keelung DianJi Temple. It was later taken over by Doctor Xu as a personal home and clinic. Our team has recently restored the building, including cleaning the stairs, reusing cypress interiors, and preserving original lighting fixtures and furniture for a historic stay experience.
description.space: Experience the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern comfort at our recently renovated and restored home in KeeLung. After 2 years of meticulous work, we're excited to welcome you to our newly remodeled space, complete with all the amenities you need while preserving the character and charm of the original old house.
description.access: Our rooms offer the perfect combination of privacy and modern amenities, including attached bathrooms. Guests can also enjoy access to our shared spaces on the second floor, including a fully-equipped kitchen and dining area for a comfortable stay.

description.house_rules:
Dear Guest

Welcome to Enzo House
In order to ensure the safety and personal privacy during your stay, please read this notice in detail. 
Thank you for your cooperation and we wish you have a pleasant stay with us. 

1.
Check-in time 3:00 am
Check-out time before 11:00 am
An overtime charge of NT$200/hr will be charged. 
2.
Do remember your room number and memorize the emergency escape route and the location of the fire extinguisher to ensure immediate response in the event of an emergency
3.
Do not jump or climb on railings when taking an elevator or going up and down stairs
4.
After 10:00 pm, please lower the volume and refrain from making loud noises.
5.
According to the Smoking Hazard Prevention Act, smoking is strictly prohibited in this building. We will charge a fee of NT$2000 to clean the room. 
6.
Do not use any stoves or heater to dry clothes, to prevent fire hazard. Dryer is available in our common area.
7.
Do not drink excessive alcohol, take drugs, or gamble in the guest room. Do not bring any dangerous or prohibited items.
8.
Please do not damage the equipment in the room, and do not take out the items in the room. If you cause any damage to the room during your stay, a fee will be charged according to the degree of damage.
9.
The luggage storage is a free service, which is only for storage and is not responsible for safekeeping. 
The luggage Storage is not liable for any damage and/or natural deterioration of luggage or of personal items stored.
The luggage Storage is not liable in any capacity for damage or loss due to unforeseeable events, force majeure and/or natural occurrences.
Perishable and dangerous are prohibited. Do bring your valuables and important documents with you at all times.
10.
Note to long-term renters

Except for Wednesday and Sunday, there will be garbage trucks parked opposite at 1450hrs and 2050hrs
Please dispose of the garbage by yourself. The garbage bags are available in the locker.

The laundry fee for pillow cases, bed covers, duvet covers (excluding towels). 
There is a service fee of NT$200, If you need our staff to change it for you

hosts.about:
漂鳥兄弟回鄉--住老厝陪老爸
明宿是我們一點一滴從設計到建造花了兩年時間完成,全木製是我們的堅持,也堅持以時間來完成我們的夢想,而無塵的山和空氣是最好的陪伴,一起遠離塵囂 徜徉在大自然裡吧~

recent.comments: This was one of our favorite stays during our honeymoon in Taiwan. Not only are the cabins beautifully built with a lot of thought and love put into them, but the hosts are lovely and so welcoming. And the food for breakfast and the optional dinners is absolutely incredible. They were even so accommodating to swap out some pork dishes to other meats since I do not eat pork. We loved every moment of our stay and wish we could stay longer. Hope to be back soon!

The bathtub is huge and the view is spectacular. We will definitely be coming back!

(11)洗澡時如房內較潮濕，走廊上備有除濕機，使用完畢後煩請放回原位，方便其他房客使用。

name: 面中央山脈for 2
title: Hualien City, Taiwan

hosts.about:
My wife Mamiko, a former  ice hockey coach from Japan, and I manage this B&B together. Both of us went to school in Montana, USA.  In our school life, we had road trips really often. Sometimes, we just grabbed few t-shirts and jumped on our car ; then, headed to somewhere without a specfic plan.

Me, Jackie, love backpacking. I have been travelling to many countries. My wife has had many ice hockey tours around some countries where people are crazy for that sports.Now, our future travel plan is to backpack around all the counties in Taiwan and Japan.

We live with parents and dogs in this B&B. Wish you will visit us soon.

recent.comments:
Jackie and Mamiko were the most chilled-out hosts, and responded very quickly every time I contacted them. In person, they were friendly and attentive. I found staying at their place extra relaxing because of their great service! 
The place itself is in the most beautiful location, which was exactly what you can see in the pictures. In my opinion the price was great value, and I found my room very comfortable. Overall, a great location if you are looking for somewhere to appreciate Hualien’s natural beauty whilst also not being too far from the city. Highly recommend!

items.comments:

name: 九份神隱國度｛白雪｝標準雙人房 I 神隱機車租借 I 九份日夜間導覽
title: Ruifang District, Taiwan

location.address: Ruifang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan

hosts.about: 攝影,看電影,旅遊

recent.comments:
The place is VERY clean, housekeeper/owners VERY thoughtful and pleasant! High bank for the buck, will recommend especially for light packers. 

Some pointers to note
-Place is quite high up so for travellers w mega luggage beware - we followed the comprehensive directive video owner sent and managed to push our 23kg luggage up the long route in 30mins. Else you can opt to take a cab up. We took a cab down to Ruifang Police Station for 270 NT (SGD12) that housekeeper kindly helped us booked 
-There is free washing machine you can use here but no dryer so up to your preferences
-Tends to rain alot here so do check the weather forecast and bring umbrella/poncho
-We went for the NIGHT TOUR which is a definite recommendation: gave more meaning and life to what 9 Fen came to be. 
-Note that MOST stalls on 9fen old street closes before 7pm so if you need food, please do so earlier... Else you can always walk to the 7-11 (no seats) and or family mart (have seats)

items.comments:
The place is VERY clean, housekeeper/owners VERY thoughtful and pleasant! High bank for the buck, will recommend especially for light packers. 

Some pointers to note
-Place is quite high up so for travellers w mega luggage beware - we followed the comprehensive directive video owner sent and managed to push our 23kg luggage up the long route in 30mins. Else you can opt to take a cab up. We took a cab down to Ruifang Police Station for 270 NT (SGD12) that housekeeper kindly helped us booked 
-There is free washing machine you can use here but no dryer so up to your preferences
-Tends to rain alot here so do check the weather forecast and bring umbrella/poncho
-We went for the NIGHT TOUR which is a definite recommendation: gave more meaning and life to what 9 Fen came to be. 
-Note that MOST stalls on 9fen old street closes before 7pm so if you need food, please do so earlier... Else you can always walk to the 7-11 (no seats) and or family mart (have seats)

It was our bad for not researching properly. Jiufen is super hill-ly so most of the Airbnbs/Hotels, you gotta hike abit up, so it is not super convenient for large luggages! Even though it’s <10mins walk to Jiufen old street but do expect many stairs! 

Nevertheless, our host was super prompt to replies and friendly.  Our Airbnb was true to picture! Very lovely themed room. Outside the room there was brochure to introduce the famous stores of Jiufen. There was hot water for refill as well as free charging ports. And what we loved the most was shoe warmers haha! Jiufen is known to be rainy. Anyway my advice is to pack light when going to Jiufen! Airbnb wise was great~
感謝管家幫我們提供，旅遊建議和導覽

description.summary:
神隱國度是百年石牆木造屋頂古厝翻新，每房均有獨立衛浴，共用交誼廳有吧台桌椅以及咖啡茶包和RO逆滲透飲水機。
平房前庭院，提供休憩桌椅，且備有高級洗衣機，免費提供使用。

神隱國度的牆壁為百年石牆，屋頂為原始圓木造屋頂，為了保持原貌，我們天花板為斜式屋頂，屋頂天花您會看到為了加強結構的鋼鐵，神隱國度是一個古蹟的翻修現成品，請大家多多愛護。

每間房間的浴室門均為海外進口訂製專屬烤漆獨有浴門，經過幾個月的製作以及海運飄洋過海到九份山上。
description.space:
神隱國度是百年歷史的石牆木造屋頂房屋翻新而成的合法民宿，附近環境清幽，位於九份高處，視野佳，可瞭望基隆嶼和雞籠山，眼前的風景彷如山水畫般，不同時刻有不同樣貌，加上令人心曠神怡的好空氣，住在這裡彷彿時光停留在永恆，然而九份的美與愜意，住在九份神隱國度可以完全感受到。
 
神隱國度步行至知名的阿柑姨芋圓只要四分鐘，步行至老街入口處7-11亦只要五至六分鐘，享受老街的便利與熱鬧氣氛之虞也可以享受到老街沒有的寧靜與悠閒。

神隱在神隱國度裡，讓您能沈澱心靈，感受九份的美與靜，讓美好的時光，停留在永恆。
description.access:
神隱國度是百年石牆木造屋頂古厝翻新，每房均有獨立衛浴，共用交誼廳有吧台桌椅以及咖啡茶包和RO逆滲透飲水機，方便來賓使用。

平房前庭院，提供休憩桌椅，且備有高級洗衣機，免費提供使用。
description.notes: 神隱國度是傳統石牆木造屋頂古厝，室內全面禁煙，禁止大聲吵鬧影響九份的安寧，我們在九份山頭，聲音很容易傳達到另外一個山頭。我們一起維護山嶺的靜。
description.neighborhood:
我們喜歡九份，如同您選擇要留在夜晚的九份的心一樣、迂迴的山路往山上看，每一次的上山，每一次均被九份山城神隱少女般的電影氛圍所感染，這是一個與天空很接近的國度，這是一個有魔法的山城。

九份的美，必須要留下來，您會看到霧鎖山城，您會看到國畫中的壯麗山水美畫，您會體驗到九份令人感動的早晨清新的空氣與日出日落，您會愛上九份這個與天空最接近的神隱國度。
description.transit:
1. 桃園機場到九份：                                          
         桃園機場搭乘機場捷運至A1台北車
      站，步行至台北捷運北門站2號出口，
      即可搭乘965直達九份。
 2. 台北市區至九份：
         可於捷運府中站，萬華火車站，或是
      北門站2號出口或是西門站2號出口
   （近國軍文藝活動中心，即可搭乘965
       直達九份。
965
平常日尖峰時段跟例假日是30-40分鐘
平常日離峰時間是40-60分鐘
可參考以下即時動態：
http://routes.5284.com.tw/ntpcebus/Tw/Map?rid=17937&sec=0
      
車上更提供免費WIFI,每座位均有USB 3C充電/兩腳插頭,車頭電子牌有齊中英日韓文顯示,非常旅客友善!


3. 台鐵交通至九份：
     由台北車站搭乘往東部幹線的火車，在瑞芳火車站下車，公車可搭乘788、827、1062或僅例假日行駛的825號公車。或是搭乘計程車，車資平時約205元，春節假日06:00-23:00為245元，23:00-06:00為265元。以上為參考，以實際狀況為主。


如何至神隱國度？至九份老街公車站下車後，由老街7-11旁入口進入，直走至台灣香腸轉彎處，由左邊暗巷茶樓進入上坡階梯走至熱門民宿，九份小町附近即可到達神隱國度。
description.interaction: 我們會與房客加入通訊方式，有任何問題，可以隨時跟我們聯絡。我們現場也會在固定時間內有人員為您服務。

description.summary:
禾嵐是位於三星連棟的整棟立案合法房源，遠眺雪山山脈俯瞰綠油油稻田和上將梨田，風光景觀美不勝收【可加賴dona53813洽詢】0915866839～一樓北歐風燈具明亮，全棟配置5台禾聯變頻冷暖氣機，室內冬天不會冷，客廳配備60吋4k聯網大電視，備有卡拉ok機歡樂唱歌，備麻將桌消磨時光，配備4組儲水式電熱水爐讓你放鬆洗個熱乎乎的澡，ps:三樓套房有浴缸可泡澡～
新型電烤肉爐可上層烤肉下層串燒，如烤肉需加收800清潔費用喔～器具放在三樓露台備有水槽舒適桌椅邊賞雪山景邊烤肉小酌泡茶，讓你體會渡假放鬆真好的feel…備有廚具與親友煮個熱呼呼的火鍋讓您度過寒冷的冬季，五組床具為亮色皮床搭配獨立筒舒適床墊，4房皆配置工業風燈具現代feel，絕對讓你有舒適的睡眠.....無論來渡假放空或是唱歌打個小牌 都能賓主盡歡～       一樓備有孝親房讓不方便的長輩或親友安心入住～～～附近景點眾多，離清水地熱25分，安農溪泛舟15分，張美阿嬤農場與鹿共舞7分鐘，梅花湖騎腳踏車坐船20分，長埤湖賞景極限運動，羅東夜市大啖美食15分鐘，來禾嵐輕旅旅遊絕對讓您有個難忘的回憶……感謝各位旅人給予的愛護支持喔
description.space: 全棟包含一樓客廳，開放式廚具，後陽台可出入，.一樓有孝親房無障礙空間雙人床和另一單人摺疊床，1組沙發床單獨衛浴，客廳配置60吋大電視，卡拉ok機，麻將桌...，二樓二間房間2大床皆有獨立衛浴房間，一間有後陽台賞景，三樓一大房有2張雙人床一個沙發床，三樓外有大露臺可賞雪山及龜山島景.....泡茶烤烤肉讓您愉快度假賞景忘卻平日煩心事

description.transit: 停車方便上將路寬敞，房源路邊白線內皆可停車非常好停車喔，亦有宜蘭公車1794號可搭乘到房源頂萬貴站下車即可到達房源喔

hosts.about:
Enzo House 安樓文旅 <安遊子心  樓濟世情  文藝棲憩  旅夢想行>

1953年。
窗外。進出電影院的人聲鼎沸。
這位於市中心的洋樓，俯看人間世事如戲，也展開了自身的故事序章。
走在這條街上的人們，尋求跳脫日常的幻想與安慰，也踏實的觀照此世的肉身。
洋樓裡，醫生對人們的細心叮嚀，至今仍在基隆人心中靜靜的守護著。
2022年。
安樓有幸接手洋樓，將老建築外牆妥善保存、架設燈光，讓街邊過客都能欣賞洋樓的美 ; 內部空間重置修膳，將珍貴的檜木材料改造再生，加入精選的老件、燈具，打造舒適優雅的旅宿空間，將其世代風華延續下去。

70年的過往，與旅客的生命重疊。
洋樓的日日夜夜，今後其中也有你的欣喜與沉思。

距離基隆廟口也近❤️對一打二的媽媽來說，就近吃美食超方便呀。
臨時的行程，還能幸運遇到這麽棒的旅宿，期待二訪。
非常特別的老宅改建，很漂亮，和照片上一樣，離基隆夜市非常近，很推薦
雖然離廟口非常近，但鬧中取靜，住宿環境符合預期。
房間內的配備充足貼心，有提供樓下Cafe的掛耳咖啡、茶和非常好吃的小吃（可惜沒有在賣）！住客可享Cafe 88折優惠是一大亮點，因為咖啡和蛋糕真的很好吃，現在仍念念不忘！很開心能夠入住這麼用心復修的老房子，若然能在入住時更了解房子從前的故事便好了。
非常棒的地點跟房子！！！
離夜市很近 冷氣涼 環境乾淨

description.summary: "Enzo House" is a 5-storey Baroque building built by the Ye family in 1953, next to the Keelung DianJi Temple. It was later taken over by Doctor Xu as a personal home and clinic. Our team has recently restored the building, including cleaning the stairs, reusing cypress interiors, and preserving original lighting fixtures and furniture for a historic stay experience.
description.space: Experience the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern comfort at our recently renovated and restored home in KeeLung. After 2 years of meticulous work, we're excited to welcome you to our newly remodeled space, complete with all the amenities you need while preserving the character and charm of the original old house.
description.access: Our rooms offer the perfect combination of privacy and modern amenities, including attached bathrooms. Guests can also enjoy access to our shared spaces on the second floor, including a fully-equipped kitchen and dining area for a comfortable stay.

description.house_rules:
Dear Guest

Welcome to Enzo House
In order to ensure the safety and personal privacy during your stay, please read this notice in detail. 
Thank you for your cooperation and we wish you have a pleasant stay with us. 

1.
Check-in time 3:00 am
Check-out time before 11:00 am
An overtime charge of NT$200/hr will be charged. 
2.
Do remember your room number and memorize the emergency escape route and the location of the fire extinguisher to ensure immediate response in the event of an emergency
3.
Do not jump or climb on railings when taking an elevator or going up and down stairs
4.
After 10:00 pm, please lower the volume and refrain from making loud noises.
5.
According to the Smoking Hazard Prevention Act, smoking is strictly prohibited in this building. We will charge a fee of NT$2000 to clean the room. 
6.
Do not use any stoves or heater to dry clothes, to prevent fire hazard. Dryer is available in our common area.
7.
Do not drink excessive alcohol, take drugs, or gamble in the guest room. Do not bring any dangerous or prohibited items.
8.
Please do not damage the equipment in the room, and do not take out the items in the room. If you cause any damage to the room during your stay, a fee will be charged according to the degree of damage.
9. 
The luggage storage is a free service, which is only for storage and is not responsible for safekeeping. 
The luggage Storage is not liable for any damage and/or natural deterioration of luggage or of personal items stored.
The luggage Storage is not liable in any capacity for damage or loss due to unforeseeable events, force majeure and/or natural occurrences.
Perishable and dangerous are prohibited. Do bring your valuables and important documents with you at all times.

10.
Note to long-term renters

Except for Wednesday and Sunday, there will be garbage trucks parked opposite at 1450hrs and 2050hrs
Please dispose of the garbage by yourself. The garbage bags are available in the locker.

The laundry fee for pillow cases, bed covers, duvet covers (excluding towels). 
There is a service fee of NT$200, If you need our staff to change it for you

name: 日月潭明宿-水裏社 四人木屋
title: Yuchi Township, Taiwan

gallery.caption: 備有日月潭紅茶 小茶几

hosts.about:
漂鳥兄弟回鄉--住老厝陪老爸
明宿是我們一點一滴從設計到建造花了兩年時間完成,全木製是我們的堅持,也堅持以時間來完成我們的夢想,而無塵的山和空氣是最好的陪伴,一起遠離塵囂 徜徉在大自然裡吧~

recent.comments:
很香的日式木屋，乾淨舒適的廁所，可以好好享受的泡澡，但是水比較小，所以放泡澡水會有點久，回甘的好喝紅茶，晚上有聽到一些車在飆車的聲音
工作人員很親切，加上幾隻一起生活在附近的可愛貓貓狗狗
有不喜歡蟲蟲的話，建議帶香茅油去噴

items.comments:
很香的日式木屋，乾淨舒適的廁所，可以好好享受的泡澡，但是水比較小，所以放泡澡水會有點久，回甘的好喝紅茶，晚上有聽到一些車在飆車的聲音
工作人員很親切，加上幾隻一起生活在附近的可愛貓貓狗狗
有不喜歡蟲蟲的話，建議帶香茅油去噴
很棒的民宿
房主很親切，早餐非常好吃

So glad we chose this place away from the busier side of the lake. Slept so soundly in the quiet and spacious room. Huge bathtub and beautiful views all around. Dinner (by reservation) and breakfast were great and made it so much more convenient to stay there.

I was a little worried about creepy crawlies coming into the cabin, but I think because it was wintertime there weren't so many. We booked to have dinner there the first night and man was it good! Totally worth it and breakfast is included too! It is right in the middle of nature so it means absolute silence at night. The cabins are really spacious, definitely enough for 4 people or a family, we were only two and had a blast. Also, everyone was so friendly. Do stay here, I absolutely recommend it.

阿爸超可愛
管家也超親切❤️
貓貓狗狗也可愛🥰

description.summary:
我的房源靠近明宿位於日月潭頭社活盆地，傳說頭社原為日月潭之日潭，當年邵族祖先逐白鹿至湖邊，並於日湖和月湖間定居，後來日本殖民政府為興建水庫，將舊日潭的水排放而使得日潭成為了一塊草泥炭土活盆地，又稱"消失的日潭"，就成為頭社庄前身。頭社為原住民邵族支傳統活動領域，為進入邵族領域之第一社，所以叫做「頭社」。

因為明宿保留傳統的日式禪風，全為獨棟木造日式建築，日式房屋因前後都有窗且可透視至屋後，因此採光好，感覺屋內較為寬敞。採高台式建築，床下設有通風孔，適合台灣高溫多濕的氣候，與現在推廣的綠建築有異曲同工之妙，您一定會愛上我的房源。我的房源適合情侶、獨自旅行的冒險家、商務旅行者、有小孩的家庭。

name: Luodong, Yilan Sommer 19 Guesthouse for 12-14pax

hosts.about:
哈囉我是Jade！每年都許願有用不完的運氣和勇氣，
卻也改不了自己的壞毛病，是最膽小的冒險家，務實但天真樂觀
總能在最後的最後，用運氣和勇氣堅持下去
隨意愛笑，喜歡到處旅行交朋友，探索不同的人事物！
每段旅程都有新的驚喜和發現，不在家時應該就是在旅行的路上！

recent.comments: 很棒

items.comments: 很棒
乾淨舒服 環境很棒
整體住宿體驗很好，每間房間皆有衛浴，方便每一位住客，該有的東備品或物品皆有備齊，很乾淨，但有一項建議，入住時，可以檢視一下每一間熱水是否都有，但很確定紅色雙人房一定有熱水，可以在入住時，把水打開確認一下，前面有一間7-11，開車騎車過去算近，原則上此次住宿體驗有超乎各位旅伴預期，推薦各位。

非常棒的住宿體驗！很喜歡
裡面要什麼有什麼非常適合朋友家人一起來居住，朋友閃到腰甚至還有乳膏😂（代表備品很齊全）更別說廚房、清潔用品等
床鋪稍微軟了一點～但每一間房間都很整潔乾淨！
房東也很熱心的協助房客，五星好評大推推
非常值得！！
Jade was super nice and responsive to our requests. Her place was super great to have a family trip together!
非常棒的房源

description.summary:
位處五結老街附近，鄰近冬山河親水公園、虎牌米粉觀光工廠、國立傳統藝術中心…..老房子經巧手規劃後賦予了新的生命，巷口即有7-11及美廉社、湯蒸火鍋、龍之園等知名餐廳。附近亦有多部偶像劇的拍攝場景，利生醫院及何鼎順餅店，讓您漫步在世代交替的迷人舊街區，享受美食與文化。

小屋每天只接待一組客人，讓您享有真正的隱私，能體驗真正的放鬆，適合情侶、好友及家庭一同入住。
description.space:
小屋為整棟二層樓（連棟式建築，兩旁皆有鄰居），沒有電梯，2房2廳2衛
一樓為客廳及廚房、廁所等室內約16坪活動空間。
二樓為兩間房間（一間套房、一間雅房）

＊一天只接待一組客人，最少2人、最多接待6人＊
＊依入住人數決定開放的房間數量＊
　2~3人：可使用一房（1雙人床+1床墊）
　4~6人：可使用二房（2雙人床+2床墊）
*小孩(2歲以上)入住與大人同價，嬰幼兒(0-2歲)不計費不加床
*請勿以小孩不佔床為由，謝謝

* 若3人入住需開二房時，需以4人入住計算 *

* 房內床舖皆為雙人床，如需另外加床墊，需以加1人計算 *
    例：２人入住，但不想同床，要另加１床墊時，需以３人計算

description.notes:
🕒遊樂園營業時間
《開放入園》16:00
《離園時間》11:00
❗️若延遲退房將酌收費用$1000/hr

❃❃❃注意事項❃❃❃
1. 訂房後請加入我們的LINE以便我們聯繫哦
2.公共空間種植許多花草，若沒關好門窗，可能會有蚊子進擊(雖提供電蚊液守備但我們不能保證100%防禦力)，很介意蚊子的朋友請不要訂房
3.‼️就算是遊樂園也有打烊時間‼️
這是在民宿中的其中一個樓層，請注意音量以維護其他樓層的房客之住宿品質
《晚間11點後及早晨8點前需要放低音量，晚間11點後禁止移動任何家具，特別是沙發、椅子、桌子等等，容易發出聲音》
4.嚴禁開趴､吸毒､酗酒喧嘩等違法行為，有違以上行為一律報警並有權不退還住宿費用
5.請勿破壞房內設備，退房時若有損壞或遺失，需照價賠償
6.進入房源需換室內拖鞋
7.絕對禁止在房內吸菸🚭
8.禁帶寵物
9.民宿無提供早餐
10. 無提供廚房､有提供洗衣機､飲水機
11. 若有嘔吐尿床等行為，需賠償一次清潔費2000元並按照住宿公約項目賠償各項物品清潔費用及賠償物品損壞費用
12. 入住時間為4點後，退房時間為11點前，有提供寄放行李但請一日前提早告知，請不要直接到達民宿而未詢問，不然可能會撲空唷
13. 民宿未開放給不是住宿的客人喔
14. 禁止攜帶非入住朋友進到民宿
15. 禁止大聲喧嘩，如果屢勸不聽，我們會請你們離開且不退房費
16. 禁止烤肉､煮東西
17. 禁止併床(因為床架都是固定好的)

hosts.about:
Enzo House 安樓文旅 <安遊子心  樓濟世情  文藝棲憩  旅夢想行>

1953年。
窗外。進出電影院的人聲鼎沸。
這位於市中心的洋樓，俯看人間世事如戲，也展開了自身的故事序章。
走在這條街上的人們，尋求跳脫日常的幻想與安慰，也踏實的觀照此世的肉身。
洋樓裡，醫生對人們的細心叮嚀，至今仍在基隆人心中靜靜的守護著。
2022年。
安樓有幸接手洋樓，將老建築外牆妥善保存、架設燈光，讓街邊過客都能欣賞洋樓的美 ; 內部空間重置修膳，將珍貴的檜木材料改造再生，加入精選的老件、燈具，打造舒適優雅的旅宿空間，將其世代風華延續下去。

70年的過往，與旅客的生命重疊。
洋樓的日日夜夜，今後其中也有你的欣喜與沉思。

recent.comments: Thank you for the wonderful stay at EnzoHouse. It was cozy and comfortable. And the location was great! Minutes away from the night market. And not forgetting the very nice coffee and great service from Enzo Cafe! Happy with my stay there. Thank you!

items.comments: Thank you for the wonderful stay at EnzoHouse. It was cozy and comfortable. And the location was great! Minutes away from the night market. And not forgetting the very nice coffee and great service from Enzo Cafe! Happy with my stay there. Thank you!
我們住得非常開心，房間乾淨又舒服，廟口夜市就在五十步外，但又不會吵，地點沒話說。將會介紹想去基隆旅行廟口吃小吃的家人朋友來住！
開車的話停車有點麻煩，房間偏小但很漂亮！
It’s very beautiful historical building, close to night market, highly recommended

房間乾淨漂亮，床舒服好睡，還有附贈餅乾，也很美味，
鄰近基隆夜市，步行2～3分鐘即可到達，非常方便，
雖然不附早餐稍可惜，但整體是令人很滿意的，未來有機會，仍會再次選擇入住。
非常方便 位置好  房間布置非常美

description.summary: "Enzo House" is a 5-storey Baroque building built by the Ye family in 1953, next to the Keelung DianJi Temple. It was later taken over by Doctor Xu as a personal home and clinic. Our team has recently restored the building, including cleaning the stairs, reusing cypress interiors, and preserving original lighting fixtures and furniture for a historic stay experience.
description.space: Experience the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern comfort at our recently renovated and restored home in KeeLung. After 2 years of meticulous work, we're excited to welcome you to our newly remodeled space, complete with all the amenities you need while preserving the character and charm of the original old house.
description.access: Our rooms offer the perfect combination of privacy and modern amenities, including attached bathrooms. Guests can also enjoy access to our shared spaces on the second floor, including a fully-equipped kitchen and dining area for a comfortable stay.

description.house_rules:
Dear Guest

Welcome to Enzo House
In order to ensure the safety and personal privacy during your stay, please read this notice in detail. 
Thank you for your cooperation and we wish you have a pleasant stay with us. 

1.
Check-in time 3:00 am
Check-out time before 11:00 am
An overtime charge of NT$200/hr will be charged. 
2.
Do remember your room number and memorize the emergency escape route and the location of the fire extinguisher to ensure immediate response in the event of an emergency
3.
Do not jump or climb on railings when taking an elevator or going up and down stairs
4.
After 10:00 pm, please lower the volume and refrain from making loud noises.
5.
According to the Smoking Hazard Prevention Act, smoking is strictly prohibited in this building. We will charge a fee of NT$2000 to clean the room. 
6.
Do not use any stoves or heater to dry clothes, to prevent fire hazard. Dryer is available in our common area.
7.
Do not drink excessive alcohol, take drugs, or gamble in the guest room. Do not bring any dangerous or prohibited items.
8.
Please do not destroy the equipment in the room, and do not take out the items in the room. If you cause any damage to the room during your stay, a fee will be charged according to the degree of damage.
9. 
The luggage storage is a free service, which is only for storage and is not responsible for safekeeping. 
The luggage Storage is not liable for any damage and/or natural deterioration of luggage or of personal items stored.
The luggage Storage is not liable in any capacity for damage or loss due to unforeseeable events, force majeure and/or natural occurrences.
Perishable and dangerous are prohibited. Do bring your valuables and important documents with you at all times.
10.
Note to long-term renters

Except for Wednesday and Sunday, there will be garbage trucks parked opposite at 1450hrs and 2050hrs
Please dispose of the garbage by yourself. The garbage bags are available in the locker.

The laundry fee for pillow cases, bed covers, duvet covers (excluding towels). 
There is a service fee of NT$200, If you need our staff to change it for you

description.summary: 七星潭星海民宿，是走地中海風形的外形設計，房間規畫計有五間，將以金、木、水、火、土五大星為創意設計，分別是三樓精緻特色雙人套房暫訂為”金星房”，本房設計將以金星為背景主題設計金星系列的房型，它將擁有絕佳的視野，直望中央山脈太魯閣峽谷的立霧溪出海口，近瞰美麗的月牙灣（七星潭）綻藍海灣美景，入夜後更可直視無光害的亮麗星海。

hosts.about:
兩位來自桃園及台中的小夫妻吉他們可愛的麻糬寶寶,
歡迎來自不同各地的旅客來體驗慢活交朋友,期待與您相遇

HML房內全面禁煙,收藏復古玩具,且務必愛惜傢俱,這裡的傢俱每樣都得來不易,每一塊木頭都是有他的故事,年輕時當過船架飄揚過海,在大風大雨中那根挺拔的電線桿,如今50年了成為永續經營循環柚木,經過師傅拼接不用釘子也不上油漆保留原貌的呈現會呼吸的木頭,成為了古月湖的傢俱讓來渡假的貴客使用｡ 



本館不主動提供拋棄式盥洗用品, 環保愛地球永續經營的家｡

離東華大學5分鐘 志學火車站6分鐘｡
 免費車站接送

另有代訂烤肉食品/行程規劃/朔溪/泛舟/夜間抓蝦BBQ/卡丁車/日出獨木舟/漆彈/輕航機/滑翔傘/等活動...(老闆私人夜景觀星海邊)

民宿每日早晨8AM-10AM供應精緻客製餐點

name: ♪ 茶米屋 David's House ♪ 花語
title: 番路鄉, Taiwan

location.address: 番路鄉, 嘉義縣, Taiwan

hosts.about:
It is always a pleasure to greet a friend from afar. Welcome to Alishan, Taiwan, whether you're coming to enjoy sunrise and cloud sea or away from hubbub of the city and seeking serenity, Alishan B&B David's House will always open for you.

有朋自遠方來，不亦悅乎。歡迎來到阿里山，不論是來欣賞日出或雲海，還是遠離都市的塵囂，尋求ㄧ絲的寧靜，阿里山民宿茶米屋永遠為您敞開大門。

recent.comments: really convenient with a bus stop right outside the accommodation, place was also cozy and nice! very clean and comfy :-) didn’t get to meet david but his parents were superb hosts too. they offered us tea and pumpkin seeds the moment we arrived, gave us tips on our itinerary, and cooked a delicious breakfast spread. would highly recommend this place!!

items.comments: really convenient with a bus stop right outside the accommodation, place was also cozy and nice! very clean and comfy :-) didn’t get to meet david but his parents were superb hosts too. they offered us tea and pumpkin seeds the moment we arrived, gave us tips on our itinerary, and cooked a delicious breakfast spread. would highly recommend this place!!
離二延平步道很近,老闆跟老闆娘很熱情招待泡的茶很好喝。早餐也是自家的青菜很好吃，值得下次在去。

The house is in the mid mountain range. Very peaceful and quiet. A short walk to hike up to a sunset viewpoint. There is a 24hr mini mart 3 mins walk away. The bus stop is right outside the door step. David’s parents are great! Super friendly and gave lots of suggestions and information on what we can do around the area. Their home cook breakfast was awesome too. ❤️ we had a great time. Thank you!

David's house I conveniently located near the bus stop and with a very near convenience store which makes everything within reach. Liu Ah Yi is hospitable and cooks delicious hometown dishes for us. David's house also recommended drivers who can bring us from Chiayi to their place and to the nearby trail. We love the overall experience of living
with the locals. Water is strong too. The heater is working.

Super friendly host. Would definitely go back next time. Host prepared delicious local breakfast.  Walkable distance from the famous eryanping trail. Host even provide us free ride after we came down from eryanping trail. Highly recommended!

my favourite room from the entire trip, beautiful decor, modern amentities, spacious, and great environment. host was super friendly, invited us over for nice tea and made good recommendations on getting around. breafast provided was simple, but delicious. dinner options were limited, but the hotpot next door was memorable with the freshest veggies, and generous portions. highly recommend the pumpkin soup base, condiment sauce was also very nice. will definitely come back for the great hospitality and food.

description.summary: We are located at Alishan Rd. around 55.5km, Convenient transportation, bus stop is beside, near the gas station, and 24H convenience store. Warm and comfortable private room. In here, you can enjoy spectacular cloud sea, sunrise and sunset.

・Self-driving - We can provide route guide for you, free parking.

・Pick-up - Whether you're coming from airport, downtown, train station, sun moon lake or other sightseeing location, for your connivence, we can provide charter car for you, fairly charge, feel free to inquire.

hosts.about:
這裡是古老山城的一角
不老的海就在腳下
放眼望去 白雲 港灣 浪花 山丘
就在鷹翼下 也都在屋內人的心情裡
此時屋內佈置簡約 音樂悠揚
人應該這麼放鬆的過日子
不是嗎 〈獨門獨棟〉
一次僅接待一組人客 僅讓妳或你們擁有
假如你無法擺脫電視 不能沒有無線網路
那麼你就不適合記憶九份

recent.comments: 제대로 대만 분위기를 느꼈습니다. 지우펀내에 있어 쇼핑하기도 편한 루트였습니다. 감사합니다.

記憶九份是落腳九份很推薦的一間民宿，有它的故事！如果太整潔規矩的飯店型民宿太無趣，歡迎你預訂記憶九份，那裡很像宮崎駿的世界，我覺得太棒了!!!!!!!

너무 친절하시고, 집이 정말 정말 예뻤어요!!!!! 정말 대만 여름방학을 즐기는 기분이었습니다. 편하게
잘 놀다갑니다!

Had the most wonderful time in this Airbnb. The most beautiful views overlooking the sea. Shirley was a lovely host, very responsive, and gave us local recommendations. One of the most unique and special airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in.

벌레 안나왔어요 너무 좋아요 호스트 아주머니가 너무 친절해요 어른들과 오기엔 적절하지 않지만 사진찍기 너무 예쁜 곳이에요 화장실 천장이 투명해서 당혹스러웠지만 재밌었어요 드라이기 성능 꽤 좋아요 어메니티 샴푸전헤어팩이랑 샴푸랑 바디워시 있는데 샴푸인지 헤어팩인지 좋아요 조식은 식빵, 달걀, 잼, 여러 우유, 바나나 등 풍부하게 제공해주십니다 에어컨 두 개 있어서 습하지 않고 쾌적해요 선풍기도 2층에 두 개, 1층에 하나 있어요 굳

The host, she is very welcoming and helpful on recommending some restaurant, coffee shop and even the parking lot! 
When you get in the place, this is where the magic begins, the decorations, lighting and the retro feel of it, which brings you the most beautiful feelings, And also, the best part is you can see the landscape from the window. Relaxing and chill are the best vibe while living in this place.

name: 3-1 Downtown Keelung nite mkt (Mthly rent welcome)
title: Ren’ai District, Taiwan

hosts.about:
Enzo House 安樓文旅 <安遊子心  樓濟世情  文藝棲憩  旅夢想行>

1953年。
窗外。進出電影院的人聲鼎沸。
這位於市中心的洋樓，俯看人間世事如戲，也展開了自身的故事序章。
走在這條街上的人們，尋求跳脫日常的幻想與安慰，也踏實的觀照此世的肉身。
洋樓裡，醫生對人們的細心叮嚀，至今仍在基隆人心中靜靜的守護著。
2022年。
安樓有幸接手洋樓，將老建築外牆妥善保存、架設燈光，讓街邊過客都能欣賞洋樓的美 ; 內部空間重置修膳，將珍貴的檜木材料改造再生，加入精選的老件、燈具，打造舒適優雅的旅宿空間，將其世代風華延續下去。

70年的過往，與旅客的生命重疊。
洋樓的日日夜夜，今後其中也有你的欣喜與沉思。

description.summary: "Enzo House" is a 5-storey Baroque building built by the Ye family in 1953, next to the Keelung DianJi Temple. It was later taken over by Doctor Xu as a personal home and clinic. Our team has recently restored the building, including cleaning the stairs, reusing cypress interiors, and preserving original lighting fixtures and furniture for a historic stay experience.
description.space: Experience the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern comfort at our recently renovated and restored home in KeeLung. After 2 years of meticulous work, we're excited to welcome you to our newly remodeled space, complete with all the amenities you need while preserving the character and charm of the original old house.
description.access: Our rooms offer the perfect combination of privacy and modern amenities, including attached bathrooms. Guests can also enjoy access to our shared spaces on the second floor, including a fully-equipped kitchen and dining area for a comfortable stay.

Dear Guest

Welcome to Enzo House
In order to ensure the safety and personal privacy during your stay, please read this notice in detail. 
Thank you for your cooperation and we wish you have a pleasant stay with us. 

1.
Check-in time 3:00 am
Check-out time before 11:00 am
An overtime charge of NT$200/hr will be charged. 
2.
Do remember your room number and memorize the emergency escape route and the location of the fire extinguisher to ensure immediate response in the event of an emergency
3.
Do not jump or climb on railings when taking an elevator or going up and down stairs
4.
After 10:00 pm, please lower the volume and refrain from making loud noises.
5.
According to the Smoking Hazard Prevention Act, smoking is strictly prohibited in this building. We will charge a fee of NT$2000 to clean the room. 
6.
Do not use any stoves or heater to dry clothes, to prevent fire hazard. Dryer is available in our common area.
7.
Do not drink excessive alcohol, take drugs, or gamble in the guest room. Do not bring any dangerous or prohibited items.
8.
Please do not damage the equipment in the room, and do not take out the items in the room. If you cause any damage to the room during your stay, a fee will be charged according to the degree of damage.
9. 
The luggage storage is a free service, which is only for storage and is not responsible for safekeeping. 
The luggage Storage is not liable for any damage and/or natural deterioration of luggage or of personal items stored.
The luggage Storage is not liable in any capacity for damage or loss due to unforeseeable events, force majeure and/or natural occurrences.
Perishable and dangerous are prohibited. Do bring your valuables and important documents with you at all times.

10.
Note to long-term renters

Except for Wednesday and Sunday, there will be garbage trucks parked opposite at 1450hrs and 2050hrs
Please dispose of the garbage by yourself. The garbage bags are available in the locker.

description.summary: 四人以上多人多房請洽詢實際價格!只有週六算假日價喔! 住宿即附贈美味早餐!  我們一共有4間雙人房及一間大4人房,每房都有沙發床可加床,採優雅舒適的設計風格,每個房間和浴室都有大窗,納入大片的田園景緻和風光,更有步出房外即可賞景聊天的陽台或露台! 房內提供舒適的優客名床、沙發床、升降桌、快煮壺、液晶電視、冰箱、吹風機、陽台、行李櫃、吊衣架......,方便旅客使用,歡迎喜歡我們設計與規劃的有緣朋友們入住!在公共設施上有許多可供小朋友玩樂的設計:球池滑梯遊戲室、戲水池、塗鴨黑板牆、沙坑、小電動汽機車、玩具、休閒鞦韆椅、氣壓按摩椅......,是適合親子同遊的好去處! 我們有獨立的大庭院及停車場,開放式大廚房有需要也可供使用,也能提供烤肉及桶子雞器材及場地,或事先代訂烤肉食材,是家族或親友們歡聚、同樂的好地方! 羅東夜市、羅東運動公園、宜農牧場、三星蔥文化館、長埤湖、清水地熱、梅花湖、九寮溪瀑布、松羅溪步道、梵梵溫泉、鳩之澤温泉、太平山......等等,都是離我們不遠的景點,誠摯期待您來與我們分享這裡夢想故事的點點滴滴....

name: Mahalo Surf B&B at Sanshuei Beach
title: Sanshuei, Magong, Penghu 澎湖縣, Taiwan

location.address: Sanshuei, Magong, Penghu 澎湖縣, Penghu, Taiwan, Taiwan

recent.comments: It’s all about the location ;-)

items.comments: It’s all about the location ;-)
很棒

We enjoyed our stay at Mahalo during the summer of 2020.  As residents of Taiwan, we were fortunate to be able to travel domestically to the beautiful islands of Penghu.  Mahalo is right across from Shanshui Beach, which is the most beautiful beach we have seen in Taiwan; the water was clear and blue, and the beach was quiet for most of the day until tour buses drove down later in the afternoon.  We enjoyed our time here so much that we extended our stay for several days.  Karen was welcoming and helpful to us during our stay.  She helped set us up with mopeds, SUP boards, beach umbrellas, and she gave local tips and answered our questions about the area.  She made us a special lunch on our last day, and we were provided with free airport transportation (thanks, Nick!).  
If you visit Penghu, we recommend staying at Mahalo - we look forward to returning again this summer!

Loved the place!  Honestly, the breakfast provided by Karen and her team was amazing.  Location is great - beach is right there, and there are several restaurants near by.  Very quiet part of the island, which is what we were looking for.  

Would stay again.

Location is very close to the beach. Room is as pictured, very clean and comfortable stay at Karen's place. Hosts treated us very warmly, and provided a lot of assistance and travel advice. We enjoyed our stay very much at Mahalo. Highly recommended if you are visiting Penghu and looking for a place away from the city and near to the seaside.

Shanshui beach is just a few steps away from Karen's place. I appreciate the airport pick up and send off, as well as helping me call for Taxis to head down to Town. Definitely the place to stay if your plan is to spend more days in this area.

description.summary: Enjoy the best that Penghu has to offer. Nestled 20 m from the beach with an unobstructed view of Sanshuei beach. All rooms with a view and huge outdoor patios for drinking a coffee or a cold beer and enjoying the stunning view.
description.space: Eco-friendly and modern with a laid back atmosphere. Surrounded by patios to chill out on and enjoy the view. Rooms are spacious with private bathroom. We have a large restaurant serving pizza, sandwiches, an assortment of coffees and other western food.
description.access: Guests are free to use our bodyboards, snorkelling equipment, beach umbrella, outside shower - no charge.
description.notes: Breakfast is included.
description.neighborhood: Sanshuei Beach is located 12 km from Magong City and 10 km from the airport. The B&B is nestled in a little village along the coast and on Penghu's best beach.
description.transit: We will pick you up from the airport and drop you off at no extra charge. We also have scooters to rent and cars can be rented in town. There's also a bus that goes into town.

description.summary:
歡迎入住魚池白宮458 C: 

我們暫時也還沒有提供早餐哦， 
不過對面有全聯，附近三分鐘路程也有美而美早餐店， 
請大家不用擔心早餐的問題～ 
一樓公共空間也正在裝修， 
裝修完成就有廚房供大家使用囉！ 

大家最關心的停車問題， 
民宿有少量的停車位， 
或者大家可以停在街上， 
但是我們沒辦法幫大家保留停車位， 
造成您們的不便我們深感抱歉。
description.access:
入住守則

入住時間下午3點開始退房時間早上11點。

希望您了解如有物品損毀，例如：打破物品、永久無法復原的損壞、永久無法清楚的污漬、待超過預定的房客入住、寵物等等...將會從您預定airbnb的信用卡裡申請扣款。

用過的杯子、碗盤記得清洗，保持環境整潔，謝謝您。

請不要在屋內吸煙，也請不要在陽台吸煙，謝謝您。

如有任何問題或需要幫忙的地方請不要客氣，立即連絡房東的airbnb訊息，或是撥打房東手機。
description.neighborhood: 我們位於魚池街上,附近很多餐廳,對面有全聯,由於我們位於市中心附近的重要道路,所以假日外面時常塞車,路邊可以免費停車,但不敢保證有位置,歡迎大家來日月潭魚池玩

這裡的環境真的超棒的，也很安靜。

description.summary:
獨棟透天房間位於2.3.4樓(無挑選房型,每間住房上限2位)
民宿在花蓮正市區
鄰近東大門夜市與香榭大道
美景美食走路就到
享受市區的寧靜美好
適合單間住宿或是三五好友渡假旅行
享受花蓮的美好週末

【 訂房須知 】
・當天15:00後入房
・翌日11:00前退房
・自助入退房
・無加床加棉被枕頭服務
・無整理服務
・無提供早餐
・無免費停車場
・無暫放行李服務
・全面禁止吸煙
・房間位於4樓
description.notes:
【 入房須知 】
・本民宿採自行入住(電子密碼鎖)
・退房日11點後密碼就會失效，請務必檢查自己的隨身物品是否已攜帶離開
・為了維護民宿品質，本民宿謝絕不實入住人數及寵物偷渡之行為
・為響應環保，外出請隨手關燈和冷氣
・為了保持完好狀態迎接下一組來花蓮遊玩的朋友，請不要破壞民宿任何設施，如果有損壞或遺失請照價賠償
・客房內設有WIFI免費無限上網
・個人貴重物品請隨身攜帶並妥善保管，外出時鎖上房門鎖以策安全，如有遺失恕不負責喔
・民宿位於住宅區，為了確保社區安寧，請在晚間10點後降低音量請勿喧嘩
・以上內容若有變動，恕不另行通知，並以民宿公告為主。

【 路線 】
･搭公車的朋友
從花蓮火車站搭程公車到中華路(中華站)下車徒步5分鐘就可以到達
･搭計程車的朋友
約10分就可以到達(約150~200元,依司機報價為主)

【 停車 】
･開車的朋友
徒步約1分鐘可到達付費停車場
･騎車的朋友
民宿房屋外圍不擋入口及不影響他人可停車(需自行注意)

【 租車 】
･租摩托車250~350元/天(花蓮火車站附近)

【 自助洗衣 】
･徒步約3分鐘就可到達

name: 超值包棟22人~Karen's house~

gallery.caption: line喔0930086896！一樓迎賓大廳，寛敞、潔淨、漂亮，聚會體面！聰明人的選擇，背包客的價格，飯店的品質！
寬敞、明亮、漂亮、潔淨！朋友聚會夠體面！
4-6人上下兩層樓中樓大家庭房，有獨立客廳
宜蘭火車站步行只要3～5分鐘，值得旅遊達人列入口袋名的入住選擇！
前有夜市、後有百貨公司、電視院，周遭都是電視介紹過之排隊美食，新民商圈是宜蘭市食衣住行最方便的地方！
4-6人上下兩層樓中樓大家庭房，有獨立客廳
每間套房皆有獨立衛浴，房間及衛浴間皆有窗戶！潔淨明亮！床包等都是自家洗，潔淨乾爽、清香，無洗滌工廠藥水味。

hosts.about: My name is Karen Chang,I like to travel in Yilan,

recent.comments: 不錯

description.summary: karen house is near the Yilan Train station. It is close to the night market, the department store and The (email hidden)so many shop close by you can get any thing for 24 hour. Our place is clean nice and guiet .
description.space: ~karen's house~位於宜蘭市中心,步行一分鐘即有有友愛百貨公司及夜市,我們位於靜巷内,房屋鬧中取静,每一間都有獨特衛生間,全新裝潢,1樓有迎賓廳可上網聊天喝咖啡、泡茶。這棟房屋步行5分鐘可達宜蘭火車站,幾米工公園及丟丟噹森林廣場。同时也靠近宜蘭酒場、新月廣場及各式文史館,在這裡您可以放鬆心情,放慢腳步悠遊自在,快樂享受漫活的美好假期!
description.access:
1.免費WIFI
2.大廳廚房、冰箱、烤麵包機、冰溫熱飲水機、吧抬皆可使用
3.為了入住安全,不提供電磁爐烹煮食物
description.notes: 宜蘭火車站旁設有旅遊中心,可索取更多旅遊相關資訊
description.neighborhood:
1.房屋位於宜蘭縣中心的宜蘭市,前往各地旅遊交通方便、周圍衣食住行超級便利。
2.白天前往各個遊覽區後,晚上回到這裡,空間寬廣佈置雅緻,大廳聽聽音樂、喝杯飲料,可以好好休息、放鬆自己。
3.房屋附近逛逛,深入宜蘭漫遊的生活步調,您會像我一樣愛上這裡。
description.transit:
1.交通超級方便,離宜蘭火車站約5分鐘,車站對面皆有腳踏車、機車、汽車出租店,車站前有宜蘭市政府提供之免費巴士,可前往很多知名旅遊景點。
2.宜蘭火車站前宜興路、友愛百貨公司前舊城南路、新民路靠近聖後街上有多處停車位及停車場。
description.interaction:
1.周末或假日住宿,會親自接待

name: 瑞穗民宿 老林家 Lin's Inn  - 水尾老宅 後山喜樂安居 (8-12人包棟) *玩水泡湯
title: Ruisui Township, Taiwan

hosts.about: 關於能量和靈性的成長、旅行、更多自由的時間、愛的關係、越來越健美的身體。。喜歡古著勝過名牌。。喜歡老物/老件/老房子。現在只愛黑/白/灰。。終日與老宅為伍、熱衷回收物復古舊貨改造。。隨著生命之流成為【老林家民宿】的主人，從地板管到天花板。老林家民宿 官網 www.linsinn.tw 。 Line合作洽談 : @xkm5551f 。。

recent.comments:

地點優 非常舒服

items.comments:
設備一應俱全 房東非常nice！
地點優 非常舒服
Great place for a family or large group! Each room was large and had a private bath. The common area is great for gathering.
這個民宿實在太讚了，超級乾淨，住的很舒適
這次是團體出遊，總共十多人，住宿體驗極佳！民宿老闆招待非常周到與體貼，房間環境更是沒話說地棒！清新乾淨～非常推薦
這是一個會讓人想留下來的空間

description.summary:
【老林家】瑞穗老宅 後山喜樂安居 

採工業復古風格新思維,特意讓這間40年老透天保有家的風華/記憶,呈現新舊融合美感,提供完整【家】的空間/思維。我們用「愛」記錄及分享家鄉 - 瑞穗美好的心念/人/事/物;描繪旅人側寫、紀錄旅行陪伴小物的迷人光采、不容妥協的癖好成痴。離瑞穗火車站5分鐘,適合情侶,歡迎單身,更適合親子團體包棟。臉書搜尋 : 瑞穗民宿 老林家。Line 找主人杰西:@xkm5551f 。
description.space:
一樓公共空間 : 交誼廳、餐廳 、開放廚房自炊無油煙料理 (餐廚具皆可使用)、衛浴、(圍爐、家庭電影院、K歌大會、瑜珈鬆筋骨、小型音樂會、讀書會、品酒大會、手作DIY…..歡迎你來刷新這個定義) 。

四間雙人套房,包棟人數 8-13 人 (含加床)
二北 2~4人 (含加床) – 手感花草小清新
二南 2人  (不可加床) – 老印章與書法的碎唸
三北 2~4人 (含加床) – 復古雜貨療癒空間
三南 2~4人 (含加床) – 慶祝單身的100種方法

我的房源適合: 情侶放閃、單身別怕、獨自旅行的冒險家我想深入認識你、商務旅客上班也可以很有趣喔、有小孩的家庭也可以讓小孩滾過來翻過去喔。

找主人杰西 : @xkm5551f

貼心服務: 
* 入住期間免費停車 (房車、自行車入內)。
* 住房費用包含【虎爺溫泉】泡湯券一張/每人(依床位數提供,原票價全票TWD200元/半票TWD 100 (農曆年全票TWD250/半票TWD150),可擇個人湯屋、或大眾湯池、游泳池及冷泉親子戲水區)。
* 提供潤膚皂/沐浴精/洗髮精、牙刷/牙膏、盥洗用毛巾/浴巾、室內防滑拖鞋、吹風機、瓶裝礦泉水、舞鶴蜜香紅茶 、來一客杯麵、冰雪碧。請自備刮鬍刀、梳子、指甲刀。 
* 早餐需自理,附近很方便很多選擇 (主人杰西可推薦)。
* 吃喝玩樂口袋名單一樣找主人杰西就搞定~
description.notes:
《溫馨提醒》

1. 入住當天15:00之後 check-in (恕無法提前)。
當天預計抵達時間點,最晚當天需提早1.5小時前通知主人杰西喔。

2. 歡迎您入住 老林家民宿,住房費用包含泡湯券一張/每人 (依床位數提供,原票價全票TWD 200元/半票TWD 100,可選擇個人湯屋、或 大眾湯池、游泳池及冷泉親子戲水區)。
若您欲使用戶外湯池,貼心提醒您攜帶個人泳裝/泳帽/拖鞋or夾腳拖。
description.neighborhood: 【老林家民宿 Lin's Inn】 坐落在瑞穗的寧靜巷弄中,近火車站、街區、傳統市場、超市與便利商店。
description.transit:
你/妳搭台鐵來: 

瑞穗火車站 (東站)下車,步行中山路一段,右轉中興路,左轉新生105號,僅500公尺,步行6分鐘,計程車3分鐘。
這麼近 ! (驚!)沒有交通工具也一樣靠譜!


你/妳自行開車:

無論是北下或是南下,經花東縱谷公路九號省道,進入瑞穗鄉市區 -> 中山路 (直行),右轉中興路,左轉新生路105號。
description.interaction:
若你想禪修閉關 老林家只有蟲鳴鳥叫!
你想談話練宵圍 主人杰西超樂意奉陪!
若你有偉大夢想 主人杰西清完耳聆聽!
若你正定義旅遊 老林家等你來刷存在!
若有我沒想到的 由你信賴你的想像力!

name: A cozy cat b&b DORIS HOME in Sun Moon Lake
title: Yuchi Township, Taiwan

hosts.about: A homebody loves travel
隨心所欲 隨興所予

I'm the host of DORIS HOME, a cat theme b&b located at Sun Moon Lake in Taiwan. You would love this small town if you spend some time with those beautiful bicycle and walking trails. Come to Sun Moon Lake and you would enjoy your vacation with cats.

recent.comments: 很舒服的住宿環境，貓咪很可愛，服務人員很親切，早餐好吃，冷氣夠冷睡起來很舒服，讓我們有一趟美好的日月潭之旅

items.comments: 很舒服的住宿環境，貓咪很可愛，服務人員很親切，早餐好吃，冷氣夠冷睡起來很舒服，讓我們有一趟美好的日月潭之旅
非常乾淨舒適的住宿體驗
舒服的住宿
住过这么多的民宿，这是我最喜欢最有人情味最有爱的民宿，以猫为主题的设计元素充满着每一个细节；而无论大堂或者房间都非常的温馨舒适、干净整洁而极富设计感；感谢Greg，让我们感受到台湾浓厚的人情味，感谢Greg，让我们享受到并记住了这个猫精灵的民宿！大爱！

很棒的招待，
如果有養寵物，到日月潭
ㄧ定要住這間，
太方便又舒服，
而且貓咪又很可愛，
整間都沒聞到寵物的味道，
早餐也非常棒

房間和公共空間乾淨整齊，空間、設備上的一些小細節也都做的很好。
貓咪們會出現在各個地方，不過都很安靜乖巧，愛動物的人會很喜歡這裡，我們這次帶了狗狗一起入住，狗狗感覺也很享受這裡的環境。
約步行3分鐘，就可以到達街上，買東西很方便。

description.summary: DORIS HOME is a cat-theme B&B with many cats in Sun Moon Lake. It is close to Shuishe Visitor Center, Shuishe Pier, Maolan Mountain Trail, and Xiangshan Bikeway in 10 minutes walking distance. We have one comfortable queen-size bed, spacious bathroom and hill view in this room. If you like a little sense of design with cozy easy space, DORIS HOME is your good choice to stay in Sun Moon Lake.
description.space:
☆ 5 cute cats around
☆ Room space is 26 square meters and bed size is 182cm*188cm
☆ Homemade breakfast from 8am to 10am
☆ Italian shampoo, conditioner, body soap, body lotion
description.access: Except the room you stay, you could also spend some time in our public area on 1st floor. We have fresh coffee and Sun Moon Lake black tea anytime. You could enjoy a short break with our cats and take a rest.
description.notes:
Please consider again if you are allergic to cats.
We are next to a green hill so that you might meet some bugs or  mosquitoes easily.
We are located at a quiet lane, please help us to keep the peace during your stay.

Wayne was very responsive when we checked with him stuff prior to the trip. He waited for us past 7pm cos we reached late! He didn't rush thru the explanation and took his time to explain to us slowly and clearly. 

The morning tour which was free was wonderful as we got to see different side of sun moon lake with a local. It was such a ptiy that there wasn't any nice sun rise that morning. Had difficulty cycling and Wayne was nice to ensure that we didnt miss out too much. He also took nice photos of us!

The room was bright and spacious and we love the design which was modern and zen. There are also ample of space to put luggages.

Breakfast was also sumptuous and homely, especially after a 4 hour cycling session! (We took our time to cycle).

Thanks Wayne!

description.space: Laurel Villa opened its doors in January 2004. Since then we've had the privilege of serving guests from all over the world and are grateful for all the support and encouragement we've received.We strive to live in harmony with nature and hope our guest can experience it by providing the most natural and comfortable living environment along with fresh and healthy meals.Take a break from your busy schedule, visit us on your next trip to Sun Moon Lake and allow us to be part of your experience. We hope you'll be able to find peace and tranquil during your stay with us.
description.notes: Should you require us to recommend a sightseeing itinerary of Sun Moon Lake, feel free to enquire with us upon your arrival. We are more than happy to provide an introduction of the area and will discuss a suitable sightseeing schedule based on your duration of stay, interests and current weather conditions (different guests will have a unique schedule tailored to their needs).
description.neighborhood:
Shopping, food, accommodation, transport, parking and some of the attractions at Sun Moon Lake are within walking distance from Laurel Villa. 

Information of the various attractions is also readily available. 

Laurel Villa is accessible by car, scooter or public transport. 

After arriving at Sun Moon Lake, the best way to enjoy the scenery is to take a leisure stroll along some of the footpaths. Other than admiring the view of lake and the central mountain ranges in Taiwan, you can also see Wunwu Temple, Lalu Island, Cihen Pagoda, Syuanzang Temple, Syuanguang Temple and Ita Thao.

Should you require further information on the attractions of Sun Moon Lake, we will be glad to help you in planning a customized itinerary to meet your preferences or time constraints.

- Places within 1~3 minute of walking -
Shueishe pier (Sun Moon Lake's main pier)
Shueishe Lakeside Trail
Meihe Gardens (Strategic location for panoramic sight of the lake)
Hanbhi Hiking Trail (The late President CKS's favourite pathway)
7-Eleven, Starbucks
Zhong Xin Road carpark

- Places within 5 minutes of walking -
Shueishe Visitors Center
Restaurant and eateries serving Chinese, Western and local cuisine
Bus stop for public buses (plying local routes and areas outside Sun Moon Lake) 
Gift shops, specialty shops, pharmacy, bike and scooters for rent

- Places within 10 minutes of walking -
Longfong Temple & Matchmaker
Wen Wan Resort, Lalu Hotel & Teacher's Hostel
Chaowu pier

- Places within 30 minutes of walking -
Shueishe Dam Lakeside Trail
Bamboo Rock Garden
Mt. Maolan Hiking Trail
description.interaction: Almost every morning where weather allows, we will lead guests to view Sun Moon Lake's sunrise, grand morning scenery and provide introduction. This early morning activity will be entirely different from the other day activities available, hence we strongly recommend this activity to personally experience and appreciate Sun Moon Lake!
description.house_rules:
When checking in, please present your identification for verification and registration.
After 20:00, please lower the volume and forbidden to maintain the quality of your stay.
According to the smoke prevention method, the hotel is completely non-smoking, including rooms, bathrooms and balconies.
Please don't bring any drugs and dangerous goods (including any prohibited goods). If you have any illegal behavior, we must call the police.
Please be informed that we do not accept pets. Do not bring mahjong.
The kitchen and bar are not open to the public. Please inform in advance if you have any additional needs.
Do not use dangerous goods such as gas stoves or induction cookers indoors. Please turn off the power and save water.
If there is a demand for parking, it can be parked at the rear of Zhongxing Public Car Park. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy preferential parking rates.
Do not arbitrarily move indoors (such as a bed). When you leave the room, please lock the door with your hand. Please keep your valuables carefully. When you check out, please return the door card.

recent.comments: Julien is such a great, accommodating host, as well as a delightful person. She went out of her way to help us with everything we needed, and even gave us a ride in her car to Dulan on her way to Taitung after checkout. The room itself is clean and spacious with a large shower and excellent water pressure.

items.comments: Julien is such a great, accommodating host, as well as a delightful person. She went out of her way to help us with everything we needed, and even gave us a ride in her car to Dulan on her way to Taitung after checkout. The room itself is clean and spacious with a large shower and excellent water pressure.
老闆娘超親切健談，房間很乾淨，住起來非常舒服。
推薦喔👍👍

新的房子、新的寢具及電器。
床褥、枕頭等都很好睡，軟硬適中。窗戶的隔音很好。有冷氣有暖氣可用。還有天花板的柔和風扇，不開窗戶或冷氣也可令空氣流動，整體就是令人好好睡眠。有免治馬桶。電視台也頗多。熱水壺也是新的。雪櫃在3樓門外，冰淇淋不會融掉。
可從玉里火車站沿自行車道走到住宿，大約20分鐘。屋主有2台自行車可以讓住客騎乘，而且住宿非常靠近自行車道，景色很優美。
附近有家好吃又便宜的pizza店，最好先預訂，否則很快賣完。玉里夜巿在步行距離，是一個中型的夜巿。圓環附近則較多餐廳。
住宿位置跟不同景點都不遠。距離安通溫泉只有約六七公里，天氣冷可泡泡溫泉。六十石山的景觀超讚，不是花季景色也很美，而且遊人較少，惟淡季沒有洗手間開放。南安遊客中心及步道也值得天晴時走走。有時間還可以跑一趟玉長公路看看大海，黃昏在觀景台還可能遇見螢火蟲(我們12月到訪)。花193道的田園風光也令人舒暢，緩緩梯田及稻米，而且車輛不多。
非常寧靜舒適

舒服乾淨的住宿
三樓房間躺在床上就能看到山 真開心

整體皆不錯，但室內很多蟲蟲
很棒的體驗，當初應該安排3天2夜，2天1夜實在有點不夠，很棒的房型。

description.summary: 我們是位於奧萬大群山海拔900公尺的山區小屋，交通方便，公車也可到達。到萬大生態電廠只需10分鐘車程，到武界部落只需20分鐘車程，到奧萬大國家森林公園僅需20分鐘車程，到清境農場需40分鐘車程，到合歡山約1小時30分鐘車程。小屋內有寬敞明亮的客廳，有設備齊全的廚房，還有乾淨舒適的三間臥室。室內設有分離式變頻冷暖氣，室外備有免費停車場。小屋外有戲水池和沙坑及近千坪的草地，適合孩子玩耍奔跑。我們這裡有陽光、和風、竹林、草地、小池、遠山，可以住宿也能露營，是一處親友歡聚，體驗山林森活的靜謐之地。
description.space: 曉山秋B棟十人包棟小屋，位於Ａ棟包棟小屋的下下下層。兩棟房源間，具有一段距離，不會互相干擾。房源內空間寬敞，共設有三間房間，包含一間雙人房、一間四人房及一間閣樓四人房，共十床位；另有乾濕分離浴室一間，及一座洗臉台位於浴室外面；一整套廚房設備，包含：瓦斯爐、電陶爐、電磁爐、烤箱、飲水機、電冰箱及一座長1公尺乘2公尺的大中島，讓您與親朋好友一起來山中大展廚藝，共享歡樂時光。從房源的長餐桌及客廳望出去，是一片竹林與遠山，不論早晨或黃昏、晴天或雨天，都能體會不同的山景變化。夜間無光害的滿天星斗，更是在都市中難得一見的風景。此房源設置了專屬的兒童戲水池，長5公尺寬2.5公尺，深度約90公分，讓您與孩子享受無人打擾的戲水空間。戶外停車空間寬敞，可停至少三台車沒問題。在室外，有設置一烤肉區域，可免費提供烤肉架給房客使用，讓您的渡假時光更加充滿樂趣。
description.access: 您可以使用整棟房屋設備，包含客廳，廚房，3間臥室及1間衛浴設施。我們一天只接待一組客人，所以您將不會與其他人共用此空間。B棟小屋外的山泉水戲水池是專屬B棟小屋客人使用。（每年11月到4月因水溫較低且正值山區枯水期，所以暫停開放戲水池。）此外，我們也允許您在戶外烤肉，如果有需要，我們會免費準備烤肉架給您使用，但食材、烤肉網及木炭請自備，並請留意用火的安全。您也可以攜帶寵物入住，只是不要讓寵物進入臥室即可。（攜帶寵物酌收寵物清潔費300元）。若超過十人住宿，多加一人酌收清潔費200元。
description.notes:
說明：
1 因為曉山秋星期五及星期六會接待露營客人，若您預訂星期五和星期六，可能
   會遇見露營客人喔！

2 若您預訂星期一至星期四及星期日，也有可能遇見極少量車宿的客人，為了避
    免彼此干擾，他們只會在小屋的上層車宿，不會到小屋這層。

description.summary:
Jiufen Shan-Hai-Guan guesthouse is located on the old street of Jiufen.
we have 5 different rooms : Double Room with Sea View, Room Sakura with Sea View, Room Caramel Macchiato with Sea View,  Double Room with Sea view balcony, Family Room with Sea view.
description.space: You can sit on the chair and enjoy the great view from the window in this room.
description.notes:
we don't have pick-up service,and taxis can not come inside the old street to our front door. you'll have to walk along the Jishan street about 15 minutes to our guesthouse. 
we are in the mountains, so you might see insects, frogs or squirrels on the way to your room. our rooms are all on the 3rd and 4th floor without elevator. you’ll have to carry your own luggage to your room.  
so if you are afraid of these creatures,or if you have heavy luggage or elderly companion who is not able to climb stairs, please consider this situation before booking the room.
description.neighborhood: we are on Jiufen old street.
description.transit: Please get off the bus at 'Jiufen Old Street' stop and go uphill a bit, then you'll see 7-11. The small alley next to 7-11 is the old street. Please walk along the old street about 10 minutes to NO. 150 and you'll see Shan-Hai-Guan tea house (山海觀茶坊). please check in there.

items.comments: 非常好的地方，幽靜美麗，很適合放鬆，附近的步道，一早起床也可以去走走，管理大哥人也很好。
公共區域非常乾淨，與照片一樣。廚房設備齊全，讓我們像在家一樣舒適。管家劉先生很帥氣、盡責，屋主很美麗、親切。
可以考慮
訂了兩晚，但是入住不到一小時即“ 逃離”，房間沒有提前整理，浴室裡都是前面房客使用過的東西，像已使用之旅行包沐浴乳、已使用殘留的香皂，都未清理；連飲用水都是入住了才提供；房間霉味很重！也很多地方都是灰塵！燈光昏暗！
風景優美，舒適環境
雖然入住體驗稍微可惜了點，但是房東的處理態度讓我願意再度回訪，期待未來有機會再度入住。

description.summary: This luxurious villa offers scenic views, a tranquil atmosphere & fresh air.  The master bedroom with a spa tub overlooking the green hill & golf course. Complimentary coffee, tea, WIFI, and tour info are available, Access to facilities under Dongsen Club such as the swimming pool, gym, warm springs, and Massage Service are available with a minimum fee.  Nearby restaurants, convenient markets, and attractions, including historic trails, parks, and cultural landmarks. Come to recharge & relax!
description.space: Two free Private Parking Spaces & Additive Guest Parking Are Available. 4-Story House with Elevator. This Master Bedroom is on the 4th Floor and Can Directly Access the Rooftop balcony to View The SURROUNDING GREEN MOUNTAINS. This Room has European Design Elements. It has a Private working desk, cabinet, walk-in closet, stylish bathroom with massage spa tub, AC, and balcony area where you can have a 360-degree view of the scenery. AC and fans are available. we provide bottled water, sheet, and towel.
description.access: The living room and kitchen are public areas. TV in the living room has a set-top box (hundreds of channels &  entertainment/sports/news programs in multi-county languages).   Guest can use all appliances (refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, gas stove, toast machine, washer, etc), utensils, plates, cups, tea, and coffee.  Please feel free to enjoy fresh fruit and a small snack if they are available at the kitchen table. Two free car parking spaces and additional street parking/ guest parking are available on a first come first serve base.
description.notes: Please prepare your own toothbrush and toothpaste.  If you want to use the club facilities, please bring your own swimming wear.
description.neighborhood: This Villa is sitting on a hillside community nearby the Lido Forestry Spa Resort. The area is very quiet and secure, the entrance has a 24x7 security gate and guard. There are many trees, greens, and flowers surrounding them. Nearby has convenient stores and restaurants. Less than a 10-minute drive to downtown.
description.transit: Two car parking space is available at the front door driveway.   Additional street parking and guest parking are also available.   If you are not driving, taking Taxi or Uber are convenient.  About 25 min drive from the Taoyuan International Airport.
description.interaction: If you need any assistance, please contact me (either by phone or text) me at any time.

description.summary:
創始人Maggie
宇宙和日光就是老闆兩個寶貝，可以一直往前進步的動力。
隱身在頭城老街的甜點公寓，巷子裏的小小基地，和我們低調的風格不謀而合。
Maggie獨家包辦的設計理念風格。
一樓為甜點店二至四樓為住宿公寓。
隱身頭城老街巷子裡，適合低調想安靜旅行的你。
當初選擇這裡就是因為真的安靜的令人安心。
交通方便，頭城火車站步行4分鐘，客運站步行3分鐘就可以抵達。
附近許多頭城小吃和超市傳統市場早餐店，不用擔心肚子餓還有開車或是走很遠才能填飽肚子喔：）位於市區覓食方便，離衝浪海域近，可以享受海灘陽光，可以眺望龜山島可以感受老街風情。
***為了維持住宿品質，沒有包棟服務。
最棒的是，我們入住時間很特別
下午5:00 
退房時間下午1:00
不用趕11:00終於可以睡飽了，
有報名下午衝浪課程的學生，也不怕退房後空出來的時間不知道要去哪兒了：）可以準備好，再出發上課，簡直太棒了吧！
提供衝浪課程代訂 以及衝浪住宿行程（配合公司有浪嗎衝浪事務所x一間衝浪店）
龜山島賞鯨代訂

시골 할머니 집같은 정겨움이 있지만 바닥 청소가 안되어 있는지 간 일행들 흰 양말들이 퇴실시 다 시커멓다.  그리고 변기에 소변 튄 노란 자욱들이 그대로라 다 닦았다. 그리고 무엇보다 저녁에 한뼘짜리 지네가 나와 기겁했고 퇴실시 한마리더 나와 정말 놀랬다.  입실 퇴실의 자유로움과 노 터치로 온전히 우리끼리의 여행은 가능하지만 청결상태는 그리 기대하지 말길. 이불과 수건은 그래도 좋은 냄새는 남.
부모님과 형제들의 봄 맞이 나들이였는데, 편안한 통나무집에서 평화롭게 잘 쉬었습니다. 감사합니다.

정말 조용하고 한적한 숙소에서 좋은 시건 보냈습니다ㅎㅎ
방도 넓고 좋습니다
편안히 가족이랑 쉬고가기 좋았으며 바로 앞 목장이 있어 아이들에게는 구경거리가 생겨 즐거웠습니다
친구들이랑 크리스마스 여행으로 갓는데 멋진 통나무집에서 할머니집에 온것같은 편하고 정겨운 느낌 잔뜩 만끽했어요~ 그리고 장작을 정말 좋은나무로 잘 지펴주셔서 바베큐도 잘하고 편의잘 봐주셔서 여유롭게 잘 놀다 갑니다~ 감사해요! ㅎㅎ

name: 宜蘭秘境! 落羽松與天然湧泉包圍的生活島屋- HA House 秋。建築師villa系列 羅東冬山
title: Dongshan Township, Taiwan

gallery.caption:
GQ團隊出動為來自宜蘭的新興樂團告五人籌劃回到故鄉拍攝，以最能代表宜蘭的場景「水」的姿態突顯吿五人的音樂創作魅力！ 開心一起划SUP，建築師和團隊親自下水協助畫面拍攝，作品真的好美。 
https://dezu.group/hahouse2-gq-taiwan/
入口的三角木頭電動門也是融合建築作品一體設計，是座啟動幸福的門。
HA House 秋-享受被自然湧泉和清新空氣包圍。藍天、白雲，隨著四季變化，來到這兒很自然的就會放鬆
春夏時分、綠意盎然，恣意躺在戶外木板上放空，心情舒暢。運氣好還能看到芒果樹開花結果
三五好友坐臥客廳聊天、打牌，伴隨自然風吹進房裡，自然生活簡單又有品味
2樓主臥大套房連結寬敞露台，早晨起來望出去神清氣爽，瑜珈墊、海灘巾鋪上還能來個日光浴
秋天橘紅黃染色大地，如詩也如畫
親子全家共度好時光，小朋友可以很安全的野放在大自然裡
柯林自然湧泉清澈見底，夏日直接可以跳水游泳，水深150公分
3樓三面環景套房，自在優雅的被自然包圍，寧靜悠閒的環境讓你睡好眠
3樓眺望宜蘭山水的套房，有俏皮的棒球手套搖椅，和自然共浴的衛浴空間，給你不一樣的生活心情轉換，白天望遠山、傍晚夕陽灑進來、晚上星辰夜空，體驗慢活的生活步調
2樓套房連結大陽台，陽光微微灑進屋內，走出去呼吸的新鮮空氣，無價
完整廚房及中島設備，大夥兒用餐笑聲不斷，迷人的空間尺度，享受宜蘭清澈夜晚和寧靜早晨之美
打開窗戶聽見微風吹拂樹梢的聲音，在落羽松綠意包圍下料理就是一種享受
夜晚用餐別有風情，點個香氛蠟燭，來杯好酒好茶話家常。 6米6挑高的用餐環境，迷人的空間尺度，讓人不自禁的想逗留互享快樂

超過6人，每多一人一晚是$2000
會提供薄床墊和棉被打地鋪。 亦可自行帶露營帳篷、充氣床來使用

description.summary:
與水共融的生活島屋 - HA House 秋，是建築師自宅系列，分享給更多人來體驗宜蘭山水與自然湧泉之美。HA House內外觀看都是完全開放的視野，一望無際又帶有豐富綠意的層次，座落在清淺的湧泉池環繞的緩坡綠地上，鐵木鋪成木棧道般的梯形木平台所環繞，大人小孩都能光著腳丫感受木頭的溫暖席地而坐、在小斜坡上躺著看藍天與被落羽松包圍，Spun Chair陀螺椅更提供大家體驗360度笑著觀賞自然景觀。在這裡，四季景觀不同，水稻田搭配宜蘭好山景，宜蘭僅有兩處自然湧泉，其中一處便在柯林，水質清澈自地底冒出，夏天能跳進湧泉游泳，秋冬可以欣賞落羽松之美，真正的放鬆、放空，和家人一起來體驗有趣的島屋設計。Welcome to experience the designed house collection from architect in Yilan, explore the local nature & fun activities with relaxation. English service is available.

HA House秋招待所作品介紹：www.dezu.group

這裏廚房的設備齊全，可自行開伙。希望是愛乾淨的房客，愛惜環境、享受美好的環境跟徹底的來感受這邊很自然的放鬆。
SUP戲水設備可租借

This is an eccentric little stay about a 7 minute drive from Sun Moon Lake, best accessible by car or scooter. The place is as pictured - a colorful interior with lots of personality in the middle of a palm forest. Our host was quickly responsive as we were initially unable to locate the place (I recommend requesting the address from him directly, as the one listed on the Airbnb, likely due to translation, is incorrect) and he gave us some tips for a delicious dinner place in Puli. Also, the place is down the road from a lane that sparkles with hundreds of fireflies from dusk to midnight during the spring (Youshui lane, closest to Miracolo View Hotel), which makes for a romantic evening walk. 
The accommodations were almost there, as we ran into some puzzling situations (i.e. all but one of the electrical outlets were saran-wrapped over so we couldn’t use them), but overall it met our needs.

隱密山林的美好環境
房間採光超讚 可以享受被太陽叫醒的感覺
舒服

Very nice, quiet, clean place with a balcony.  You definitely need a car or scooter to reach this place and explore the surroundings, but I highly recommend staying a bit farther north from the lake and its touristy environs. The paths and sights and restaurants and tea cafes around the bnb were wonderful to explore! The owner is very friendly and helpfully picked us up as the bnb was a bit farther than I initially thought.
very good

Wow! Just like the photos, this place was breathtaking! An absolutely stunning room with ceiling high windows overlooking nature and a balcony to soak up the views. We loved the huge bath and comfortable bed, we slept so well and didn’t want to leave! 

Our host went above and beyond to make our stay for Christmas enjoyable. Helping us to get to sun moon lake and surprising us with coffees Christmas morning- he was so kind- thank you! We are an English speaking couple and although the host does not speak English, we could communicate by translate fine.

A note to any English speakers, the address on Airbnb when copied into Gmaps is incorrect. The property is about another 5 min drive away. If you ask the host for the address, check his response in your email (not Airbnb app as this will automatically translate into English) for the Chinese symbols and paste this into Gmaps to find the address.

真的非常漂亮，房東的路線指示清楚明了，早餐雖然不是什麼大餐，但是其實挺好吃的！有地瓜粥，烤土司或餐包，還有高山高麗菜跟其他杏鮑菇，真的讓我吃得很滿足！停車也很方便，夏天來仍然非常涼爽，也沒有一堆蟲蟲！物超所值，朋友問我要住哪裡我一定推薦！

Room was nice and host was good. We had to ask a bit in order to get information, but overall it was ok. Our room was one storey down from the lobby, not that ideal because we were blocked partially by a tree at the balcony and more shrubs at the tv side. Guess the vegetation must have grown a bit from the time the advertised pictures were taken. So ask for a higher floor to have better views. We took public bus transport around the area to get to the sheep farm and little swiss garden, it's not walkable from the accommodation.
Margaret gave useful instructions for us before check in. The room looks exactly like the picture. Love the breakfast spread too. Enjoy our stay there.

description.summary:
我的房源交通便利。景觀、舒適、地段、寬敞房間、活力早餐,您一定會愛上我的房源。適合情侶、商務旅客、夫妻家庭。一邊可觀賞能高山與奇萊山，可看日出、日落，超美的湖景。

私人二人套房、獨立衛浴、私密性高、周遭環境安全舒適......房間典雅、寬敞明亮、可提供2人住宿。

客房備有電視(含有線電視頻道)、Wifi、茶包、吹風機、冰箱、牙刷、浴巾、沐浴乳、洗髮乳、浴帽、拖鞋、紙毛巾、香皂、冰箱、熱水壺、電風扇、電毯、乾溼分離衛浴。

歡迎來清境看山、看湖、觀星、日出、日落、雲海,自然景觀一覽無遺。如果您有任何問題,請“聯繫房東”找我。

我們提供的服務:
1.距離公車站，走路1分鐘
2.距離青青草原，開車7分鐘
3.距離小瑞士花園、遊客中心，開車五分鐘
4.距離7-11便利商店，開車3分鐘
5.距離老英格蘭城堡，步行500公尺
6.協助預約台中高鐵、台中機場或日月潭及其他地區的交通車
7.協助預約觀星、看日出一日遊
8.附近超過5家當地特色餐廳、咖啡廳

**行程前請留意天氣狀況
description.space:
【我們的故事】
清晨- 金色的陽光,穿過山谷裡的薄霧,投射在清境農場。甦醒的大地,頓時充滿了旺盛的活力,彷彿所有的生命都在跳躍,但這氣氛又是如此的安詳寧靜。我走在花園裡,可以感受到一朵朵的小白花,正迎著朝陽,興高采烈的綻放。花瓣上,襯托著晶瑩閃亮的露水,更顯得清境的純淨高雅。

民國五十年,一群由滇緬撤退回台的國軍,落腳在這塊高山農場上。結束了戰爭的顛沛流離,胼手胝足,重新在這裡的開創新家園。早期的生活環境,是如此的艱辛,老實說,當時尚在年幼的我,並沒有真正吃到苦頭,但所有的見證,都刻劃在爸媽長滿繭的雙手上。在小時後的記憶裡,沒有所謂的機械怪手,那一層層由石塊堆砌起來的梯田,都是爸媽赤手空拳開闢出來。

但辛辛苦苦的付出,卻不一定會有回報,在夏天收穫的季節裡,突來的颱風,常把待採的高山蔬果,一掃而空。還記得在一個大颱風的夜裡,我可以感覺到房子被風吹的在晃動,爸爸拚命的頂住嘎嘎作響的大門,深怕整個木造平房,會被一擁而進的狂風給掀走。隔日,暴風雨過後的景象,讓人有劫後餘生的感覺。

就這樣,爸爸媽媽拉拔我們五個兄弟姐妹長大,從沒見過他們埋怨老天,或是向現實低頭。我的家,也就在清境生了根,發了芽!就好像這高山,只要不離開土地,就可以成長茁壯,繁衍生命。

我走遍了世界各地,才發現原來最真、最好的地方,就在我眼前的這塊土地上。清境給予了我三十年前一樣的感受,安詳、沉靜,且充滿了旺盛的生命力。

眼前這塊土地,是爸媽辛苦一輩子,所換來的成果,懷著一顆感恩及分享的心情,我們的家,即將邁向下一個成長的路程,不向環境低頭,讓生命繼續繁衍在這塊土地上。

清境的主角,是山 是雲 是陽光 是空氣,是這塊會呼吸,有生命的土地。懷抱著感恩的心,讓我們好好善待這塊土地,讓她永遠散放著美麗的氣息。

hosts.about:
我們是愛種樹，愛玩木頭的森林人，平日喜歡收集老房子拆卸下來遭遺棄的檜木舊木料。搶救即將遭受燒毀的老木材。如今，我們賦予舊木料新的生命，重新將堅韌的本質展現出來。

私たちは樹木が好きの森人、古い建物から取り外したヒノキの窓枠や、焼却処理予定の古い木材などを集めで、新しい命を吹きこむ。

great and peaceful place.

吃早餐的地方很有特色（而且早餐吃完很飽
房間雖然不大
但該有的都有
位置去九份或海邊都很方便！
房間設計感很厲害，老闆人也很好，跟他聊天學到許多東西！感謝！
外面有一大塊陽台，四月沒有蚊蟲，也沒下雨，很適合看星星。房間很舒適溫暖，老闆的早餐豐盛如同動畫會出現的早餐。需要爬樓梯到房間，適合情侶、親子們。

description.summary:
我們是愛種樹，愛玩木頭的森林人，平日喜歡收集老房子拆卸下來遭遺棄的檜木舊木料。搶救即將遭受燒毀的老木材。如今，我們賦予舊木料新的生命，重新將堅韌的本質展現出來。

我們用檜木舊窗框拼貼出溫馨的小廚房，用檜木舊木料做成地板、桌子、窗台及畫框，顛覆一般人對舊木料的粗獷形象，以更細緻、更具現代感的方式呈現，傳達我們對原木的喜愛。

來一趟「木質元素」，撫觸原木的溫潤質地，感受我們的用心，進而也能同我們一般，喜歡原木，喜歡森林，喜歡大自然。
